1.content:
From within a dark, dimly lit room with a large oval, curved window at the front of the room a man roughly standing at 5" 11 wearing a black trench-coat complete with a sharp easy settling cape, he was also wearing matching black boots made of a mysterious possibly enchanted or scientifically advanced material similar to that of leather, with white markings in the shape of snakes. He wore a tight hood around his head and hid his face with a gleaming silver one-way mirrored, flat, faceless mask completely encasing his face from ever being seen by naked eyes. The man also had a small, tight but reliable belt complete with a Swiss army knife strapped under his coat hidden from view attached under the belt. The man had a decent enough physique as the suit underneath the trench-coat held to it.

The man was sitting down with his hands on his knees, the chair was large and luxurious, crisp leather was what it was made from. It was a cold evening as the sun went down roughly just a few minutes ago it was the hour of twilight, the view was gorgeous from his oval window as you could gaze for miles over the city.

The man didn't speak, he just tilted his head up at the window and stood up, not even making enough sound to work out that he was breathing. He slowly walked over to the window and dramatically hit it with his left hand spread outright, with his black glove covered palm against the cold, icy window he thought to himself taking in the great view of Shinjuku from wherever he was standing as of this moment. (Shinjuku...the blue phoenix, Ace Kamen? ...Viola Lambert...Takato Matsuki...things are going to change around these parts, especially for the Xeno affinity corporation or the X.A.C for short...I wonder which side will win? Good or evil...)

Then he spoke out in a loud and demanding, powerful voice which would send chills down anyone's spine, he seemed mad and hungry for power and control, typical of a leading type of person "...Because...not everything is black and white so they say...but who are they to judge when they are neither side? ...If evil loses, I'll see it all turn and fade away..."


Prologue "Like a dream..."



-- Later --

Late at night outside a large secure military facility, three renamon were standing outside the locked entrance...

The first renamon was male, he had dark red fur and was roughly 6" 5. He spoke up readying himself for something in a friendly but cocky voice "You guys ready for this?"

The second renamon on the left was shorter only standing at 5" 2 and had pale blue fur, she said slightly intimidated by the size of the facility, as she was speaking it started to rain as thunder arced across the midnight sky "Frank; I was born ready. What about you Wendy?" She asked looking to her right past Frank.

A green furred renamon answered drawing a short katana, she answered to the blue renamon "Snow do you even have to ask?" she was 5" 6 being slightly taller than Snow the blue renamon.

They all eyed the entrance as they saw three soldiers in the distance.

They all got down to avoid being seen as they planned their attack.

The soldiers wore black trench-coats, armored and tinted gas masks with steel coils attached, matching black armored leggings and boots with black leather gloves, they all wielded black carbine rifles.

Frank the dark red furred renamon put his hand up in a fist, they all nodded as Frank put his hands together and exhaled as a blast of intense flame melted through the barbed wire defending the entrance as they cut through it like butter effortlessly despite a storm going on it did not hinder the flame.

One of the three soldiers readied his carbine aiming right at Frank but before he could shoot was slashed across the chest by Wendy the green furred renamon.

The soldier collapsed as his gun danced on the floor from the impact of falling.

The two last soldiers eyed the three renamon as they scrambled to their feet and ran away like cowards.

Frank laughed as the rainy storm worsened into something of a tropical storm despite the climate.

The three renamon advanced into the compound past some armored jeeps as an alarm blared, Frank shouted over the alarm to Wendy and Snow "Find the secondary Dictator of the X.A.C! Those two soldiers were quick to alert the compound, I'll go on ahead and provide a distraction while you two lay low and search for the second!"

They both nodded and ran off to find the "Secondary dictator". Frank burst open a door and drew his black katana as it lit up in blue flames he uttered slashing through the room without even batting an eyelid "Flashfire, come!"

The room burst into life as the soldiers screamed and collapsed burning Frank continued on.

Snow was shooting ice shards into the sky and reflecting the light off of them to keep an eye on the entire facility from the sky using them as mirrors or crystal balls.

Snow said irritated as she kept searching relentlessly "God damn that scumbag where is he!? If we kill him we can end this."

Wendy was jumping over the rooftops of the large facility using the wind to bound across the otherwise insurmountable gaps, she stopped at a tower on the side of a ledge and peeked her head around the corner into a window very cautiously as not to be seen from the dwellers within the tower.

She gasped as she saw a small group of Elite soldiers like the black suited soldiers except they had gleaming white armor and the same carbines as the black soldiers.

In the middle of the four man group of elite soldiers was a young man aged roughly twenty-five who was wearing a casual morning suit, had short brown hair and a chiseled face, yelling at the soldiers as they were arguing about something.

Wendy uttered to herself "The secondary dictator, if that man dies his cause dies with him!"

Wendy was about to put her ear to the glass to eavesdrop but the storm and rain made her footing gave way as she slipped and barely saved herself by landing against the glass smashing through the window.

The Elite soldiers almost instantaneously as they were trained to opened fire on Wendy as she used the wind to escape through the window again and deflect the bullets.

Wendy landed on the ground as she caught her breath as a small platoon of the normal black suited soldiers raced past searching for intruders.

She hid behind a pipe as the soldiers left she came out and began jumping over the rooftops again using the dark stormy night as a backdrop as to not be seen easily.

Wendy said jumping back to where she last saw Frank near the entrance "I've found him! I don't know how long he'll be there but I have to tell Frank ASAP!"

Frank was running through some narrow hallways setting everything he ran past ablaze in rage for the secondary dictator.

Frank yelled over the screaming soldiers who never stood a chance as the flame purged them out of the building "Come on out 'second dictator!' You can't hide forever!"

Wendy smashed through a skylight into the hallway in front of Frank as Frank asked out of breath "D-Did you find him!?"

Wendy nodded pointing at the tower halfway across the compound.

Frank and Wendy jumped out of the broken skylight and began making their way there.

Frank made a 'come here' gesture with his right hand as Snow saw this with her ice shards she jumped and made her way to them.

The three were together again in a group as they began making their way there.

A few minutes later of carnage as the soldiers tried to stop the pursuit they made it to the tower, Frank melted the blast door as they began storming up the stairs.

Before Frank could even get a flight up the stairs something punched him in the face and almost broke his jaw with so much force it smashed him through the steel barricade and out into the street again.

Wendy and Snow looked back and yelled ready to fight "FRANK!"

They turned around to face forward as a girl walked down the stairs.

She looked to be about twenty years old wearing a streaming white dress which now had Frank's blood dashed over it and dark blue shoes, the dress covered down to her knees but no more, she was wearing nothing on her arms or her face, she had two golden blonde braids and strange artificial evil looking red eyes.

She was roughly 5" 7. She looked malnourished and severely underweight but was beautiful. Her face was gentle and thin but at the same time looked emotionless and drained.

The girl said looking down at them heartlessly from the staircase "Frank and his worthless friends still having trouble keeping up?"

Snow and Wendy readied to fight, Snow said in disgust "Viola! You won't stop us this time, this time we are killing the second dictator and you can't stop us!"

As the three dashed at each other to fight as Frank woke up...


Frank said lying in bed as the morning sun rose outside his window... "That same dream again? I'll never get over how close I was to finishing off that bastard the secondary Dictator Lewis...and his lapdog Viola stopped me; the bitch!"
1.title: Prologue "Like a dream..."

choices: Chapter 2: The party and catching up
11.content:
A man wearing a dark red trench coat buttoned up and an Indiana Jones style hat covering his eyes standing near a street lamp. He had a detective feel about him from the old movies, but his hair was short and slick back with a comb. He was looking at his watch on his wrist for a second before moving his arm down to his side. He is about the same height as the man wearing the mask looking like a phantom of the opera and he had a handsome face that wasn’t blocked off by the hat.

“Going by what my friend wearing the black mask said. If good loses, I will have to help them out a bit with sending a pair teachers to help out.” He said with a smile

“A boy that has the power to transform into a digimon and a partner who is like family to him, but will he find someone to call his heart’s desire. Ace Kamen, a young warrior trained by the best teachers and on the quest to find the elemental foxes. He needs to find the royal knights and ask them about the ancient paladin.” He added before it started to rain.

“Will he find what he is looking for and complete his quest? I don’t know, but it will be interesting to watch.” he said before walking down the sidewalk.

Chapter 1: A warrior coming home.


The city was quiet and still during some part of the day like it was normal, but other times it was a battle for saving the town from digimon. Two people were walking towards the city at a slow pace and they have black hooded cloaks covering their bodies from view, but one of them was taller than the other one by a head. These two were returning from a trip that lasted three years of training and another 6 months of searching for elemental foxes. They fought against armies of rogue digimon they were mostly rookies, champions, and a few ultimates. They were killed and turned into data was absorbed into the digimon that killed them.

The digimon that killed them was a renamon, but this one is different because of it evolution line and her eyes are light pink or rose pink. Her armguards are the same, but the color is a slightly darker purple than the normal ones. Her partner is a human that can digivolve into a digimon and fight with her. The human’s name is Ace Kamen and he is a special person that can use magic. He had enough training to say a single word for a spell to work and have to say the entire spell. He has short messy black hair, dark brown eyes, 4'9 or 4'10.

He wears a sleeveless black training gi with red flames, a headband with the ying-yang symbol on the center and the color of the headband is yellow with purple outlines on the band. His gi pants are black with blue flames, the arm guards were made for blocking sword strikes since they were rough and they were a dark gold color, and the leg guards were the same thing except the color was dark silver with wings. To tie it altogether is a belt was a dark rainbow of colors, his body shows well-defined muscles, but he is stronger than he looks and he fights to protect his friends.

“To think it has been three years since that event and we had to leave for our journey for more training.” the short one said

“Your friends will be glad to see you again and show them how strong you gotten.” The tall one said

“We found half of the elements we need for the final mode of your mega form.” They added

“Just need fire, wind, ice, darkness, light, and metal.” The short one said holding five cards in his hand glowing a different color of said element.

He put the cards away before stopping to see the city he left behind for 3 years and he was happy to be back. it was a few seconds before another army of digimon appeared surrounding him and his partner. The pulled the hoods off so they can see the army of champs and ults digimon, but they smiled.

“Thanks for the welcoming party, but it was in vain.” Ace said before pulling out his digivice and one card.

“We will get revenge for our friends your data fiend.” One champ said before ace’s renamon was laughing.

“Data fiend? You are the ones who keep coming after us so it’s not our fault that you are being stupid.” She said before they got ready for a fight.

“You want to end this or me?” ace asked holding the card ready to scan it

“Let me do it. I have a new move to try out.” She said before making crystal shards appearing

He nodded before standing by, but his hand on his sword as his digivice is on his belt and the card in the deck case. His partner nodded thanking him for the trust to end this quickly.

“Diamond Blizzard Storm!” she yelled as the shards teleported and it started to snow around the area

In the span of a few minutes, the entire army was reduced to data in seconds and she pulls the data towards her. She left some data for the digimon to reform as a digiegg but no less than that. They sighed before putting their hoods up and walking into town. She always lets them live, but they need to stop coming to them.

“I always find it weird that our teachers had digimon music on a iPod for you and it was from all of the seasons and some of your favorite music as well.” She said as he was looking at her.

“This is them you are talking about. They always seems to surprise us during training and keep the family card out of use so we can actually train and not cheat our way through.” He said looking through his music selection.

“Are you going to get a new look or wearing the same thing?” she asked and he shrugged his shoulders.

“Might as well, before getting home and relax for the rest of the day.” he said putting his ipod in his pocket.

The two were walking towards a clothing store that is by their favorite teahouse. They see some people looking at them, but it was only for a few seconds before going on their way. Walking into the clothing store, he pulled his hood down so he could see the collection of men’s clothing and his partner walked over to the other clothing racks. He got a black leather jacket, dark red muscle shirt, dark blue jeans, and dark brown belt. He also picked up a grey button down shirt with yellow flower pattern before paying for the clothes.

“I’ll get some new shoes on the way home.” He said carrying the bag that has his clothes in it.

They went to the teahouse to grab some tea to go and head for home for the day, but they went to the mall for his new shoes at a good shoe store. They left the mall to get home fast so they travel by rooftops of the buildings. It took them a few minutes to get home and inside before locking the door. As soon as he did, lights turned on with a yell “SURPRISE!” he turned to see all of his friends there with their digimon.

“We felt the digimon and the sudden disappearance.” Rika’s renamon said

“Also see the weird blizzard in one area for a moment” henry said

“Well, I thought we would make it home without too much of a scene.” He said as his renamon took the bags to his room.

“Had to get a set of clothes and clean my gear.” He said they nodded knowing he has been away from home for 3 years.

He looked around the house seeing all of his friends and their parents, but his parents are not here to greet him home. “Your parents are away doing a renovation project with their digimon and they said that will be here soon.” Rika said seeing the sad look on his face

He started to think of a project that could be fixing up for 3 years and he smiled. “I know what is getting fixed up.” He said slightly chuckling

“Good thing we got it done early.” A male voice said behind him and this caused him to kick his father in the chest sending him out the door.

This was met with sweat drops and a giggle from his mother. “I told you that would happen, dear.” His mother told his father when walked back inside.

“Before things gets started with the party, I’m going to take a shower and clean up. I have to be sure that I don’t have to repair my gear.” He said raising a hand into a half seal “Flash step.” He said vanishing in a flash going to his room

“A lot can change in 3 years so I wonder how they managed their training.” his father said with a smirk.

Ace stripped down to his boxers and formed another half seal. “Clean.” He said as his training gear was being steam cleaned while the sword was being clean with sword cleaning oil and the shoes were being polished. He grabbed a towel and a cloth before stepping into his bathroom for an overdue shower. After starting the hot shower, he jumped in before turning cold water on a little so he doesn’t burn. He started to clean the dirt, sweat, and other things off his body. He started to wash his now longer hair that reaches the base of his neck. He sighed in content after he was done washing his hair and let the water hit his body. Shortly his partner hopped into the shower so she could clean off as well and it took them about 30 minutes to get done. He was drying off while hearing a sound and sees his partner puff up like a big ball of fur. He was smiling and trying to stifle his chuckles, but she knew he was failing. Taking a quick picture before helping her with her fur, he was dressed in his new clothes and putting on his new shoes. They went back to the party because they waited long enough, but that shower was heaven for them.
11.title: Act 1

111.content:
The planners of the party heard footsteps coming down the steps and they smiled.

“That was amazing for a shower.” Was heard from ace.

“That was paradise.” His partner agreed.

“Was there any directions on how to clean the cloaks?” she asked him.

“Don’t remember, but I’m sure it’s either normal, dry cleaners, or a steam clean.” He said shrugging his shoulders.

“Enjoying being home again?” his father asked smiling like a kid planning something.

“Three years since that event plus spending time with my friends before we had to leave for three years. Spent another 6 months on a search for some renamon that had elemental powers.” He explained surprising them.

“I have another mode change under my belt, but I have a final one to trigger after finding the rest of the elemental renamon.” He said before pulling out ten cards from his deck case.

“What do you mean ace? Elemental renamon?” rika asked as they were all confused

He paused before smiling. “Sorry, I just got home and I’m planning to find the rest of my final mode change to paladinmon.” He said as they nodded

There was barking heard as ace was tackled by two viximon, Vixy and Kits, licking his face as the others chuckled at the sight.
“Alright, I know you both are happy to see me; I have to get up.” He said laughing and petting them before they could pin him down by growing on him.

He got up before walking over to the table standing next to his partner and rika. Not getting a good look at his friends after walking into the door, he took the time to look at each of his friends. Rika and Jeri finally blossomed into older teenagers with some curves, takato and henry look smarter then 3 years ago; but takato still has the goggles of a leader, ryo being the oldest starting to have some peach fuzz on his face. Alice closer to henry’s age started to bloom as well; but not reached puberty calling yet, henry’s little sister, suzie definitely has gotten taller for being 10, finally ai and mako at 7 grew a little. Rika grew close to being her renamon’s height so she is slightly taller than ace.

“I’m sure digimon has been popping up during my trip, but I think this party is just getting started.” He said as hip-hop music was playing.

“A birthday party disguise as a welcome home party.” He said with a laugh

There was dancing first and ace was dancing all over the floor with each of the girls and dipped rika with a hand in her back jeans pocket. She and Jeri has a DD-cup figure with matching ass so takato and ace might be in their sights for boyfriend material. Soon it was time for cake and presents and they made it back to the table as the digimon didn’t leave the table. He got more clothes from rika’s mother and some tea from her grandmother, some recipes from takato’s parents to make for his during breakfast, henry’s family gave him several books covering a various subjects; but henry and suzie gave him some pictures of terriermon wearing a pink princess dress. Ai and mako made him a picture of ace, them and the other tamers and the digimon. He smiled before rubbing their head and turned to alice and ryo.

“You got something for me?” he asked them who nodded.

Ryo gave him a few copies of his cards like radiant form and goliath while Alice gave him a charm bracelet with all of the digimon including her dobermon who gave the tamers the power to biomerge to face the d-reaper. He gave her a hug and a kiss on the forehead like an older brother would.

“Thank you for the gifts I will use them well, but before the last gifts are received I have to give a gift.” Ace said before grabbing his digivice and the family card from the deck case.

“What gift?” rika said

“With great power comes great responsibility, but this is for a good cause.” He said as if to remind himself.

“Digi-modify: Alter Activate.” He said as the area around him became distorted.

He walked to the living room before going into a meditative position and he started to float. They were all watching him withheld breaths as he was forming hand seals guiding the power. His partner gave him some of her data that they collected for this moment. Blue and red flakes of data started to appear floating around him before converging together forming a black digiegg with a slate silver band. He floated to the floor ending the card’s effects and waited to feel some feeling in his legs before trying to stand up. All of them are staring at the digiegg he made with shock and awe.

“This is my gift to you, alice, I have been planning on this since the end of the d-reaper.” He said before standing up walking back to the table.

He gave the egg to alice before sitting down back at his spot and let go of his held breath.

“That will be dobermon in time, but that will depends on how you raise him and he might remember you.” He explained feeling slightly tired.

Feeling happy to have a chance of getting her digimon back, hugged ace and kissed him on the cheek. He smiled returning the hug before turning to rika, her renamon, and his parents since they have yet to give their presents to him. Rika and her renamon turned to him gave him a photo of her and him looking at the cherry blossoms before he left for training and another one of her wearing a dress that her mother picked out. This caused his eyes to widen and stutter while getting a faint blush. They smiled liking the reaction and his partner was laughing madly in her mind hearing his thoughts.

“So pineapple head, you actually found a dress you would wear.” He said smiling using the nickname he used on her when they met and became friends.

“Using that old name? Thought you be more mature.“ she said smirking at him

“Before both of you get into a ranting debate, we still have to give our son his gift.” His father said as they walked over to ace getting behind him.

“Since we took a cruise before you left 3 years ago and your friends came along for a break after winning the tournament at school.” His father said

“Where is it you want to go for the next trip?” his mother asked and ace started to think about it.

“My teachers have been telling us tales of kids like us going to the digital world and fighting evil, but they must have gotten older by now or passed away.” He said turning to see his parents.

“They might still be around or they moved away after so many years.” His mother said and he looked at her.

“I would like to go to where they lived, Odaiba.” he said

“You want to go see where it first started.” His father said and ace nodded

“It’s not too far away from here, but I think we can stay there for about a week or two.” He added with a smile.

“Your friends can go with you, but the younger ones will stay here.” His mother said while suzie, ai, and mako groan.

“Alice, I want you to stay so you can get your dobermon into cerberumon” ace said

“You might get a paomon and take up to seasarmon if that happens. Both that and dobermon can digivolve into cerberumon. I added a trick to his code so you should get a dobermon in the end.” He added and she nodded to agree.

“Well, that only leaves the cake.” His father said as ace cut the cake and everyone had two pieces.
Ace’s partner took the gifts up to his room while the parents took the job of cleaning and putting things away while the tamers were in the living room drinking tea and talking.

“How was the training?” ryo asked him

“It was hard work, but it was worth it. I would it with the training might guy and rock lee go through in the Naruto anime.” Ace said

“You had to learn that you couldn’t rely on one card like the family card, but you did use your own power.” His partner said phasing into the room.

“We went under physical training, spell training, and form training.” he said

“Form training?” takato asked

“We were to train using only one form at a time to use less energy when digivolving.” Ace’s renamon said

“It was during the mode changes for paladinmon that I got an idea for a new mode change, but it need both my renamon and my crystal necklace.” He said before pulling out the card of his newest mode change with the attack Icicle Lance Barrage.

“So tell me what has been going on while I was gone.” He said as they started to tell him each of their own paths for the future.

“Henry is going to be like his father, Ryo is going traveling with his digimon, Takato is going to be an artist, and Jeri wants to tryout in sports like ice skating, dancing, and gymnastics. Alice is going to school and helping at a pet shop, suzie has been babysitting ai and mako, Kenta working to be a doctor, and Kazu is like shikamaru, but he is going to be a teacher.” Ace summed it up for them, but turned to see rika looking away with a faint blush.

“So pineapple head, what have you been doing the last three years?” he asked with a smirk and she gave him a deadpanned look for the pet name.

“I have been working with kaa-chan on her fashion show and look over her contracts. I trained with renamon so we could get stronger.” She said and he nodded

“My plans are to find the other 5 elemental renamon and get my final mode change.” Ace said
111.title: Chapter 2: The party and catching up

1111.content:
“What are elemental renamon?” rika asked

“Special renamon that is apart from normal renamon that can control an element.” He explained as he took out ten cards two in the center with four around them and the last four in between the other four cards.

“Light and Darkness are the two eternals. Fire, Wind, Water, Earth are the four primary elements while Ice, Metal, Thunder and Wood are secondary elements.” He said as the cards started to glow a different color of the said element

The cards started to move into a direction with Fire, Wind, and Ice in one group. Water, Earth, and Wood in another group while Metal and Darkness into different direction while Light and Thunder are in front of both renamons.

Rika was surprised to see her own partner is one of the elemental renamon ace was looking for and ace smirked to see his renamon one of those he needed for his final mode change.

“I knew about my renamon was one of them, but your renamon is a welcomed surprised.” He said before putting the cards away into his deck case.

“What is your final mode change?” takato asked

“Sun Warrior.” He said

Soon the guests left leaving only rika and her renamon knowing he would take them home.

“Are going to take us with you on your search or are you going alone?” she asked him

“I don’t know. I want to relax after my trip here and see where it first started with the digimon.” He said shrugging his shoulders.

“There could be one slide evolution if I go twilight in my new mode and take it further with sun warrior.” He said looking at vixy and kits.

“Why didn’t the light and darkness card point towards them?”

“Either too young to handle the power or they are like the normal renamon.” He said petting them.

“Besides they are needed for renamon mega form when she goes crystal.” He added

They walked out of his house so he could walk her home like he did in the past. He was looking at the moon and stars before turning to see her looking at his muscular body. She turned away blushing and he chuckled.

“I’m going to be relaxing for a few days before deciding when to go on the trip and maybe I’ll find something there to start my search. The cards are general in direction, but that is till they get in my line of sight.” He said before letting out a sigh

“Something wrong?” she asked

“Just thinking about the future generation of tamers after our time is done.” He said

“I feel kind of excited to see it.” He said with a smile

“Do you think I can strong like you?” she asked

“What do you mean? You are strong in your own way or do you mean with getting muscles?” he asked with a raised eyebrow

“Getting some muscle without looking like a freak on steroids.” She said with a sigh

“I don’t know, but I say you are stronger than you think and it’s in your way. Let us think about it and see what happens.” He said giving her a hug.

“Most of my power is hidden till I need it for a hard fight or planning to get serious. Besides I might get taller so we can be the same height, but my base power will still be stronger.” He explained his hidden power.

They walked to her home and she kissed him on the cheek. He smiled before kissing her on the lips stealing her first kiss. She had a shocked look on her face and he was chuckling before her renamon took her inside. He and his renamon were laughing all the way home, but she will get even with him.

“So good to be back home after a long trip.” Ace said before getting inside and up to his room.

He got ready for bed and kept his deck in a safe lock box that only he or his renamon could open under his bed and he wrapped himself around his partner feeling her fur before falling asleep. She hugged him before her too going to sleep after a long trip.

~Time to see what will the future and time will show us. Maybe rika could use some help getting stronger.~ she thought, but it ace’s decision on the matter.
1111.title: Chapter 3: Elemental Renamon?

11111.content:
The next morning with Frank...


The next morning at Frank's house, Frank was lying in a messy bed in a bright room with no curtains letting the full light of the dawning sun pour in, bringing life to the room and waking him up.

Frank moaned and sat up blinking tightly having barely gotten any sleep.

Frank said to himself annoyed yawning "For the love of -*Yawn*-...why do I even bother trying to sleep when all I have are those nightmares and dreams of my past? Especially that dream I had two nights ago...failing to kill the secondary Dictator. I might never get over that." He thought to himself not feeling energetic enough to continue talking to himself (That bitch Viola stopped me...I wonder if Wendy and Snow are awake?)

He jumped up and opened his door, then walked out into the hallway and looked down cocking his head left and right to look to see if anyone was there.

Frank said to himself trying to wake up stretching "Well looks like the coast is clear."

Frank yawned again and walked downstairs to get some breakfast.

Frank walked across the living room and into the kitchen, Snow and Wendy looked at him, Wendy was wide awake and full of life but Snow was dreary and tired looking same as Frank.

Frank asked Wendy amazed "How are you so awake so early?"

Wendy said laughing "I don't know I just am."

Snow asked annoyed "Can I eat in peace please?" she asked stuffing some toast into her mouth.

Frank sighed feeling more awake and said sitting down "I had another dream two nights back."

Snow and Wendy looked at him interested.

Wendy asked handing him a plate with two slices of toast on it "What was it about?"

Frank said chuckling while picking a slice of toast "What do you think? It was about the Xeno affinity corp again. Or corporation or whatever you say it like."

Snow said perking up "Tell us what it was about, were we in it?"

Frank nodded and continued while eating "Yeah *Munch* both of you *crunch* were there, it was when we were trying to kill the secondary dictator and it was a stormy night."

Snow and Wendy looked down remembering.

Snow said saddened that they were beaten by Viola "Yeah...I remember...man I'll never live that one down."

Wendy said disheartened "It was pretty embarrassing, Viola beat all three of us."

Frank slammed the table with his left fist while the other held half a slice of toast, he spoke in disgust gritting his teeth and blinking strongly "She wouldn't have beat us if she didn't knock me out with that sucker punch! What she did was cowardly attacking from the shadows, if I had seen her coming we would have won."

Snow said laughing as Frank calmed down "You underestimate her, I don't know how a human is so powerful but the X.A.C must have done something to her like...I dunno, gave her drugs or experimented on her or even magic? Anyway the point is that she is a lot tougher than you think. It's unbelievable she took you down with a single punch."

Wendy said taunting Frank "Yeah, beaten by a girl with one punch."

Frank said chuckling surprising them both "Like I care, you two didn't hold up very well against her either from what you told me the night after I recovered."

Wendy and Frost looked at each other defeated sighing.

Frank spoke up opening his eyes again while finishing off the toast "Besides, that was three years ago just after the D-Reaper crisis, I'm so much stronger now, she wouldn't stand a chance like I am now."

Wendy said narrowing her eyes "You overconfident idiot."

Frank said teasing "Overconfidence is fine when you have the power to match it."

Snow said laughing "What's this? You're trying to be philosophical?"

Frank said gazing over to her "Don't use words with more than eight letters you'll hurt yourself."

Snow said standing up "Anyway enough of the nonsense, have you done any more training lately?"

Frank said chuckling while getting up "Like I need it, all I've done these past three years is train for taking down the X.A.C again. For the good of Digimon everywhere they must be stopped!"

Wendy asked as the two slowly walked out of the kitchen and into the living room "Where are you two going?"

Snow said opening the front door "I'm going into Shinjuku to keep an eye on the X.A.C, Frank you coming too?"

Frank shook his head and said aloud "Nah, I'm going solo, I'll keep an eye on them too but not as much as you since you have that ice mirror technique."

Snow sighed and said closing the door "Well bye then, be careful."

Frank said to Wendy pondering some more around his thoughts "Wendy, you know the X.A.C are evil and profiting off of killing our kind right? Even experimenting on them..."

Wendy stepped closer then nodded and spoke up "It'll be fine Frank, three long years since we failed to stop them, now we are stronger, you said it yourself, all the three of us have done since then is train and relax. I think it is time for action again."

Frank said annoyed pushing her back "Where do we even start? We don't know where Lewis the secondary Dictator even is right now, what are we supposed to do about that?"

Wendy said knowingly "Snow can find him with her ice mirror technique, I can find him quickly with my speed, it'll be fine."

Frank asked interested in the answer "Do you...do you think we are strong enough to beat Viola now head on? We need to be strong enough for her if we're going looking for Lewis again."

Wendy was silent for a minute but then spoke up confidently "Yes Frank, if all three of us fought her fair and square at once we would have nothing to worry about."

Frank nodded and asked opening the front door "I'm going out now, anything you want from a store or something?"

Wendy shook her head

Frank nodded, sighed and left shutting the door.

Later in town...
11111.title: The three elementals

111111.content:
Ace woke up early out of habit from training grabbed something light for breakfast before walking out of the house leaving his partner sleeping in the bed. He is head for a morning cup of tea when he sensed something kin to digimon, but also an element. He had his deck case and digivice with him just in case. During their training, his digivice changed to a gold one with a red strap and a silver band. It could also track elements because he tested it with thunder on his partner so he knew she was one of them. Pulling the fire element card out, he spin it on his index finger by the corner before taking a stance.

“Digi-Modify: Fire Tracker Activate.” He said sliding the card through

In a few seconds, he got a reading in a direction to a location that is not far from he was. Putting the card back in the case, he paid for a tea to go and started running towards the element.

~Why would one element be in town? I have to talk with them and see if they are with any other elements.~ he thought as he remained on focus on his current task

It only took him a few minutes to get to the general area of where the fire elemental renamon is from his increased speed during his first year. Little did they know that they spent more time than that due a room like the hyperbolic time chamber from Dragon Ball Z anime, but can spend more time training just for 2 years. He got to where he should be able to see the fire elemental, but he teleported behind the said element using his senses.

“Before you try to think of guessing of who sent me, I think we need to have a talk and I will be honest. We are both related to the D-reaper event three years ago and you are one of the remaining renamon i’m searching for.” Ace said behind the renamon

“I only came to talk with you, not fight. Your two friends Wind and Ice won’t be happy if we just fight like animals here. Will you have a cup of tea with me?” ace asked the fire elemental renamon
111111.title: Meeting with Fire

1111111.content:
Frank turned his head slightly about 40 degrees to the left so his left eye could just barely see him.

Frank narrowed his eyes and asked cautiously "Who the hell are you? Are you with the X.A.C?"

Ace said shaking his head "No I am not with them, I've heard about them but that's all. Aren't they the ones killing Digimon?"

Frank nodded and turned around fully to face him "Let's talk then, try anything funny and I'm leaving."

Ace nodded and motioned for him to follow him, they got to Ace's favorite tea house.

Frank and Ace sat down across from each other.

Frank began the conversation "First of all I think I should introduce myself, then you."

Ace nodded as Frank began "My name is Frank Bellows, my friends call me Blaze, or used to a long time ago when I lived in the Digital world. Now you."

Ace spoke up confidently "My name is Ace Kamen, most people call me Ace, the reason I was looking for you was because you are not a normal renamon..."

Frank asked interested "Would any of this have to do with the fact that I can control fire?"

Ace said nodding after sipping some tea "You catch on quickly, yes, you are the fire elemental renamon."

Frank asked intrigued "What does that mean?"

Ace spoke up putting the tea down "It means you are a one of a kind Digimon, you are gifted with the power to control fire like no other. Now are you with two others? The wind elemental and the ice elemental?"

Frank nodded "Yeah I am, the wind elemental has a name, her name is Wendy, the ice elemental, she is named Snow."

Ace asked interested "So they are both girls? Are you going out with one?"

Frank said sighing "No I am not, they are just my old friends."

Ace said getting up "Sorry for asking, can I meet them now? Afterwards we can talk more and I'll explain everything about why I was looking for you."

Frank nodded getting up having finished his tea "Yeah fine, let's get a move on then."


*Meanwhile in Northern Shinjuku...*


Deep in an autumn forest in France, there was a oak log cabin. Inside was a little blonde girl with two golden braids and blue eyes, her two golden braids hung at each side of her face and were wrapped in green cotton bands. She was wearing a white and blue dress which went down to her knees and did not hide any of her arms. She was also wearing teal shoes. She looked to be about seven years old. She was sitting on a man's lap.

The man had a very dark grey, bushy moustache, short dark, almost black, brown hair flattened down which went down to his ears, the man looked to be about 37.

The man was wearing a red and white checkered shirt which shown his burly, manly physique easily. He was also wearing black trousers and had large black boots on. He was holding a storybook in front of the little girl and reading it out to her in a manly, warm voice typical of that of a woodcutter "And the wolf blew and blew..."

"ARGH!"

Viola jumped up from bed in a dark bedroom.

Viola stuttered with tears welling up in her eyes "F-father...why did you have to leave me? ...these damn dreams again..."

Viola stood up out of bed still wearing her white dress. She walked into the next room which was a restroom and washed her face.

Next thing she heard someone knocking at her door. It was still quite early in the morning. She looked in the mirror and her eyes were not red and bloodshot anymore, they were blue.

She walked over to the door and opened it with her left hand, she laid eyes on two elite white armored X.A.C soldiers fully equipped and holding carbine rifles.

Lewis was in between them, he had a chiseled face and brown hair with blending features and wore a white morning suit.

Lewis asked worried about something "May I come in? There is something we need to discuss."

Viola reluctantly stepped out of the way for him to come in, he put his right hand up speaking aloud "No need for you two to follow me, I don't think Viola is going to kill me."

The two soldiers chuckled lightly under the armored gas masks and the soldier on the left said taking a stance against the wall "We will wait here then sir."

Lewis nodded as he walked in past Viola.

Lewis sat down on one of the chairs at a small round table.

Viola flicked on the light and sat down opposite him.

Viola asked still rubbing her eyes from crying "So what is this all about Secondary Dictator?"

Lewis spoke up looking her dead in the eyes "There's been a problem. We have reason to believe Ace Kamen is back from training and he is in the area, but that's not the bad part..."

Viola narrowed her eyes asking more "Then what is the problem?"

Lewis narrowed his eyes even further dramatically "...Frank Bellows is back."

Viola's face turned pale.

Viola asked in shock "N-no! I killed him three years ago, I broke his neck by punching him through a wall, I felt it! Remember? You escaped because of his death!"

Lewis said shaking his head "Turns out he's tougher than to let himself be killed off so easily, he's back from three straight years of training and probably mulling over his failure at your hands. You need to be more alert now than ever. I don't know how but I think his two friends the green and blue renamon saved him back then, it's possible and it probably is that you only knocked him out with your punch."

Viola looked down in disgust and said slightly angry at herself "I shouldn't have held anything back, I was overconfident."

Lewis said getting up "Then you know what to do if you see him or he shows up, I'll leave you to get back to whatever you were doing then."

Viola put out her right hand as he was leaving and spoke out "Wait! What about...did you learn anything about what happened to my father?"

Lewis swallowed hard and answered after thinking about something for a few seconds "No, we haven't learned anything else other than what I've told you; that he was probably done in back then, but we don't know who by, now get some rest, you look like you need it."

Lewis closed the door as Viola flicked off the light and lay back down again to think about things...
1111111.title: Sweet memories

choices: Back with those three and maybe viola
11111111.content:
After leaving the teahouse, ace followed frank to where his friends are so he can talk with them and explain why he is looking for them.

“It’s not too far now and I’ll let them know you are a friend.“ frank said as ace nodded while they ran to their destination.

“That will make it easier on me.” Ace said

Silence took over rather quickly, but frank had a question on his mind.

“You are the only one that digivolve into a digimon?” he asked

Ace was quiet thinking of his answer.

“A few of the other tamers can biomerge with their digimon and I can as well, but I’m the only human that can turn into a digimon. How that happened? I have no idea.” He explained and frank nodded

They picked up the pace to the house he was staying at with snow and wendy. Soon they made it to the house and frank motioned him to stay outside for a moment.

~Ace, where are you?~ his partner asked in his mind

~Was getting tea for a wakeup call, but I felt the fire elemental renamon so I’m meeting with the wind and ice elementals.~ he said before frank came back out and motioned him to come inside

~I’ll be home soon so I can tell you later.~ he said to her before cutting the link and walking inside the home

“So this is the human that found you and took you by surprise.” The light blue renamon said crossing her arms looking at ace

“You must be Snow and the green renamon is Wendy.” Ace said getting nods from both

“The name is Ace Kamen.” He said bowing to them in greeting

He spotted a table and pull out his ten cards and placing them in the same pattern as he did before. They came over to watch this and snow was about to say something when ace stopped her.

“Three years ago after the D-reaper event and some months passed, I gotten my digimon partner and she is a renamon looking like a normal one. Except her eyes, armguards, and more importantly her digivolution line is different from a normal data type renamon. I discovered that I was able to digivolve into a digimon unlike any others.” He explained before pulling out some more cards

“My forms are Samuriamon, Championmon, and Paladinmon. Paladinmon have some mode changes like fox form and my newest form. There is one last form I have to obtain and that is the Sun Warrior mode change. I can only get it by searching for the renamon that have the elemental powers. Fire, Wind, Water, Earth, Metal, Wood, Thunder, Ice, Light, and finally Darkness.” He said as the elemental cards glowing of said element

“After meeting you three, I only need to find Darkness and Metal. I know that you I’m only using you to get this new form, but it’s not that simple. I have to gain the trust of each elemental renamon and gain a card with one of their elemental attacks. My own partner is of thunder and a fellow tamer has a renamon is the light elemental.” He added

“As I told frank before, I’m not with X.A.C. and I never really kill digimon unless…” he paused as his face turning dark and serious

“Unless what?” Wendy asked

“They are after my friends.” He finished with a cold tone it made snow seemed warm

“An Icedevimon was after my friend with a renamon and it pissed me off so much to see her scared and she developed a shiver when he comes near.” He gave an explanation and his voice was much colder than before.

“I get stronger so I can protect my friends and my partner. Some digimon are family to me while others are friends that I don’t leave behind.” He said before lightening up.

Wendy was looking at him with stars in her eyes before hugging him. Snow was staring at him with some shock and amazement. Frank smiled at him knowing he would do the same for snow and wendy.

“You are so kind and willing to protect your special people.” wendy said cheerfully rubbing her cheek against ace’s cheek.

“You and I are the same when we fight to protect our friends.” Frank said nodding to ace

Snow is looking at him her opinion of him changing thinking she could trust him, but not completely yet.

“I admit that you are not like them and you tell the truth, but I cannot fully trust you yet.” She said and he nodded as wendy let him go.

Ace hold out his hand before the cards flew to it and he put them back into this deck case surprising them.

“I have cards for Water, Earth, Wood, and Thunder. Light, Fire, Ice, and Wind are next. Darkness and Metal will have to wait till a later date I guess.” He said as he turned to the door.

“If you have contact from either elemental renamon, let me know.” He said handing them a card with his number on it.

“Frank knows where I go for a morning cup of tea.” He added before leaving their house and walking back to the teahouse for a real breakfast while getting something for his partner.

~I’m on my way back to get some breakfast and tea for us.~ he said to his partner

~Good, we can talk over that and see where we stand on the mode change.~ she said before leaving him be.

He simply walked back to the teahouse for two more teas to go and some healthy breakfast. He is on his way back to his house.
11111111.title: Meeting Ice and Wind

111111111.content:
Snow asked Frank worried about Ace "Should we really trust him? Who's to say he's not really working for the X.A.C? I hear they have many spies."

Frank sighed and scratched the back of his head while looking down with his eyes closed "Come on, he's just a kid, they don't let people younger than eighteen years into the X.A.C or did you forget that?"

Snow said protesting "Not that, I'm just saying that they could be taking advantage of the age system, the X.A.C would stoop to any level to get what they want and you know that."

Frank said groaning gazing at her "You're being crazy now, I would be very surprised if he was a spy, he's already proven to us he's on our side by showing us those elemental cards right? So what is there to worry about?"

Snow sighed and said looking away annoyed "Idiot."

Wendy said as they both eyed each other dramatically "G-guys calm down, no fighting in the house remember I just finished cleaning it this morning!"


Meanwhile...


Lewis was walking down a street in Eastern Shinjuku with two elite soldiers guarding him.

Lewis stopped at a dark alleyway where no one was and signaled his two bodyguards to wait at the entrance and make sure no one entered.

Lewis pulled out his mobile phone and began dialing, he then held the phone to his left ear and began the conversation "Hey Gamma."

A man roughly aged about forty said grumpily down the phone "I told you never to call me by that stupid nickname."

Lewis said jokingly "Well you know if no one knows your real name you're safer right? So take it as a blessing not a curse."

"Gamma" sighed and asked annoyed by his presence "Right, right what do you want? I don't suppose you phoned me up to pester me did you? I'm in the middle of an important meeting."

Lewis asked interested "M-meeting? What meeting?"

Gamma answered "My scientists were having a meeting about which venue of research to pursue next to do with Digimon, this could turn big profits for the corp."

Lewis said as he face palmed himself "Oh! Right I forgot about that, listen you shouldn't talk in that tone to your leader okay? Show some respect."

Gamma said laughing "Some respect? To you? You're not even the real leader, you're just the secondary."

Lewis said pissed off raising his voice "I AM the leader as long as whoever the hell is the big cheese is not around then I AM the leader until then got it!?"

Gamma said backing off from the phone "My ears, calm yourself, watch out we got a badass over here."

Lewis heard the scientists laughing in the background, Lewis yelled at the top of his lungs down the phone "I'M IN THE AREA SO DON'T MAKE ME - *sigh* whatever, hey what evidence do you have that this 'Dictator' even exists?"

Gamma said calming down the laughter "Oh? Interesting question, maybe you should ask Viola."

Lewis glared and froze. Then he answered "Viola? ...what does she know about him?"

Gamma said jokingly "Who knows the truth? And the truth...will set you free...the truth, will set you free."

Lewis said annoyed "Are you playing games with me old man?"

Gamma said frustrated "You kids these days, no I am not playing games with you, I'm just having a joke. But back to the question, don't bother asking Viola about it, she'll never come clean."

Lewis said chuckling "Oh right of course, almost forgot about her training and those things Doctor Alfred did to her. Anyway I'm in the area and I wanted to come talk to you face to face about the corporation's scientific research, more importantly if you've discovered any better way to execute Digimon rather than to just shoot them and extract the data?"

Gamma spoke up "No, there is no other way I've discovered...yet."

Lewis said sighing "Great, perfect."

Gamma asked interested "So what is the real reason you've come out to my playground of Eastern Shinjuku?"

Lewis perked up and remembered "Oh! Right, I'll tell you just what I've told Viola and what I'll tell Shaun, A tamer named Ace Kamen is back in Shinjuku, but now this is where it gets interesting...the "blue phoenix" is back."

Gamma froze and asked coldly "Then...what do we do? Should we trust in Viola and Shaun to beat him again?"

Lewis said laughing "Viola thought she killed him back three years ago but obviously not, our scouts have seen him walking around town, he's in the Southern sector."

Gamma said laughing "Ah yes, that cunning fox, he knows exactly what he is doing setting up his base in the Southern sector where our defenses and forces are weakest, no director controlling the South side, just normal scouts and soldiers armed with small arms, hardly any elite soldiers too, how are we going to go about this? Remember that Doctor Alfred wants to experiment on the blue phoenix."

Lewis said scratching his head "I don't know but if he's back this could be really bad, not to mention if he is working together with Ace Kamen or the three tamers that defeated the D-Reaper. Don't call him the blue phoenix, just call him by his real name 'Frank'."

Gamma said sighing "Do I have to? Blue phoenix sounds more threatening than Frank."

Lewis said speaking into the phone "I don't know I don't care. Call him what you like."

One of the elites walked into the alleyway and asked him checking his rifle "Secondary Dictator, will you be talking here much longer? We've just got a call that a group of Digimon are attacking on the West side."

Lewis spoke up away from the phone directly at the soldier "No, the West side is strong, Shaun knows what he is doing, I told you to the guard this alleyway while I'm doing business so guard!"

The elite white armor plated soldier reluctantly went back to guarding.

The soldier that was still guarding asked the other soldier "Hey what did he say about the Digimon attack?"

The other soldier answered as the one who just spoke was placing the safety on his rifle "I don't know, I swear it's like he doesn't even listen. He just said "They can handle it, Shaun is strong enough ehhhh I have lots of money you commoner soldier."

The other soldier burst out laughing and said waving his hand down "S-Stop don't talk like that about him, if he catches you-"

Lewis asked annoyed walking up to them having finished talking with Gamma "If I catch you doing 'what' exactly?"

The soldiers both answered standing up straight "Nothing sir!"

Lewis said shoving past them "Whatever, let's just go, I'm done here."
111111111.title: Honor to the corp

choices: Their decision and with the dictator
1111111111.content:
“Two of them trust me, but one seems to think I’m one the digimon killers.” Ace said to his partner as they finished off breakfast and he explained his meeting with the three elementals.

“Ice seems to be cold nature, but at least you aren’t an enemy to them.” She said as they get ready to leave

“I was hoping for the fire and wind cards, but I know it would be too easy. They have to fully trust me in order for me to get the cards.” He said looking at a blank card with a lore on it with the name Paladinmon: Sun Warrior Mode.

“They have to test you as well.” She said

They left the house to walk over to their normal workout spot, but he stopped sensing something.

“Digimon and it’s a mega level.” He said pulling his digvice and called the tamers.

“Attention tamers, I just felt a mega digimon enter in the city and I have a feeling that it’s a peidmon. Alice, you stay with suzie, ai, and mako. Rika, you takato, henry, and ryo meet me at the field. I have a feeling that its time to reveal my new node change.” Ace said getting agreements from the others before heading there himself with his partner following his lead.

“Are you sure it’s a piedmon?” she asked

“We haven’t fought it one since training ended so this will be a field test and I think those three should know.” He said before pulling out his phone calling frank, snow, and wendy.

“Hello?” it was wendy on the phone with frank and snow listening in.

“Wendy? Its Ace. I felt a mega level digimon come into the city and I think it is a piedmon. I know snow doesn’t quite trust me, I’m calling to let you three know about it and watch the show.” He said as she nodded

“Thanks for the tip. Will you need help?” she asked him.

“I don’t think so. Paladinmon is a super mega, which is stronger than a super ultimate and I have some of my friends as back up if I need it.” He said honestly

“Alright. Anything thing else we need to know?” she asked him

“Just keep safe and try not to get turned into the doll keychains.” He said before ending the call and ace used the swift step to fasten his pace with his renamon following with ease.

“Doll keychains?” snow asked her eyes narrowing

“I think it was a reference to something.” Frank said

“We can ask him when we get there.” Wendy said as they left the house to follow ace.

Meanwhile, the said mega digimon is in fact a piedmon and it appeared in the east Shinjuku before it noticed the three people walking. It jumped in front of them smiling cruelly before pulling out its four swords.

“Trump Sword!” it yelled before the swords killed the two soldiers before they could try to kill it and the secondary dictator was feeling like he was staring death in the face.

“Hey Asshole!” a voice yelled drawing the attention of the digimon and the dictator

Ace and his renamon appeared between them and he was wearing his repaired armor as his sword was drawn.

“Ace Kamen.” The dictator said in shock seeing the kid that might be saving his life.

“Run away from here or you will be killed.” He said with a cold voice

“What?” he asked confused

“I know you have a hand of killing digimon so you have a chance to run while I fight this digimon. If I see you kill more digimon, I will find you and I will kill you.” Ace said with a voice colder than the artic tundra. The dictator nodded before running away scared for his life making sure he would give him a reward for saving his life.

“Now that is over, time for the real fun to begin.” Ace said as the three elementals were on a roof of a building while the other tamers appeared on the sideline.

Ace sheath the sword before pulling out a card and his digivice.

“Digi-Modify: Alter Activate” he said triggering his trump card and the entire area turns into a white void with both the tamers and elementals watching.

“Whoa. How did he do that?” frank asked interested

“Ace, I hope you used that to prevent collateral damage.” His partner said as he nodded before moving his hand pushing the digimon back with unseen force.

Pulling out another card one that he did not use yet.

“Digi-modify: Double Digivolution activate.” He said as both he and his partner glowing

“Renamon Digivolves to……….” His partner said turning light blue and transparent.

“CrystalRenamon.” She said in her ultimate form

“Ace Warp Digivolves to……….” He said glowing before flashes of light blinding them.

“Paladinmon.” He said in his mega form as the piedmon came back to see the new forms of his opponents.

“Alright time for the new mode change.” He said as his renamon nodded before jumping into the body causing it to change.

A black helmet with a white crescent moon appeared on his head as the yin-yang symbols faded away and on his left shoulder, there is digicode for Honor, but Justice on his right shoulder. His eyes changed to light blue as his body turn pale blue and a black demon looking mask on his face. The armor of imperialdramon turned into crystal before reforming into dragon and wolf themed samurai armor. His left arm has the dragon claw gauntlet while his right arm has the wolf fang gauntlet. Two sheathed swords appeared on his right side and they are made of crystalized diamond steel. His attacks are Crystal Phase, Thunder Shard Cut, Fire Crystal Slice, Icicle Lance Barrage, Rock Crystal Spikes, Silent Shadow Spear, Wind Sheer Cutter, and Crystal Leaf Blade.

“This took his champion form on a whole new level.” Takato said seeing his first form with the other tamers.

The three elementals were surprised to see this form and it shook snow the most.

“He looks like he made of ice and glass.” Snow said

“It doesn’t matter what mode you use you won’t send me back.” piedmont said and paladinmon smirked

“You don’t have a choice.” He said before drawing out both swords from their sheaths.

“Trump Sword!” he yelled the swords aimed to kill the new paladinmon

When the swords stabbed him, he shattered to pieces and the tamers were shocked.

“Looks like he didn’t quite cut it.” He said laughing

“Crystal Phase.” A voice said as ace came back to the fight behind piedmont.

“What?!”

“Icicle Spikes.” He said before piedmon was impaled with ice spikes and he was turned to data.

Ace returned to normal as did his partner before taking most of the data to replenish her stock from making the egg of dobermon. The tamers ran over to him and rika help kept ace steady as he ended the effects of the trump card meaning the white void vanished. He pulled out a flask and took a drink from it. His renamon was slightly tired, but she was still fine.

“Why is that form so easy to break?” rika asked

“Needed the element of surprise before crushing him.” Ace said with a light dark tone.

“It was a nice trick, but you need more of a show with that form.” Kazu said and ace narrowed his eyes making him retreat behind rika and takato

“Something wrong, ace?” rika asked

“Just winded from using energy and running here.” He said

He heard his cell phone going off so ace pulled it out.

“Hello?”

“Hey son. Do you think you need to use the other house for your search?” his father asked him

“Only if you and mom come with us so I’m not cooking alone.” He said

“Alright meet us at the mansion soon.” He said ending the call.

“What did he want?” henry asked

“To move the base of the search to the other house and I think he wanted us out of the house.” Ace said feeling a smile forming on his face.

“Speaking of, how is that going?” jerry asked

“I’ll tell all of you over dinner at the house.” He said with a leader tone.

“Rena-chan, you will have to take them there. I’ll catchup.” He said with her nodding

She led them to the mansion where he used to stay at when he was younger as he teleported to where the three elementals were during the quick fight.

“I can’t you everything, but I can if you follow me to where they can’t find you. The other tamers don’t know I found you already, but my partner does and I think the light renamon sensed you. I’m not sure, but it be best if you join us so we can help each other out.“ he told them
1111111111.title: Morning Workout and Crystal Revelation

11111111111.content:
Frank closed his eyes and thought for a minute, then answered opening his eyes nodding "Fine, we'll do it your way. So you're sure we won't get anymore trouble from the X.A.C where we're going?"

Ace said laughing jollily "No worries, this base is hidden from anyone."

They all began walking to the mansion...


Meanwhile...


*Huff...huff...huff*

Lewis stopped in the middle of a dark alleyway, he said to himself not believing what just happened "What the hell was a mega level digimon doing inside the city!? Did my soldiers do nothing to stop it getting past the border...maybe it came in through the South side! But why would Ace Kamen help me? ...Was it accidental?"

Six original black suited soldiers walked up behind him with carbine rifles ready, the one at the front asked Lewis worried "Sir are you alright? We came as soon as we heard about the attack."

Lewis said pissed off "Those two 'Elite' Soldiers I had with me just stood there and got cut in half! Elite my ass!"

The soldier at the front spoke up again putting his right hand up slightly "Sir calm down, you may be in shock."

Lewis sighed and tried to calm down, he then spoke up "Let's get out of here. There is nothing left for us to do."

The squad moved out back to the Northern sector where their main base was...


Meanwhile...


A man with brown buzz cut hair, green eyes and wearing a heavily armored grey trench-coat was cleaning his gun, a carbine. He was not wearing any head-wear like a mask. He looked to be in his early thirties or late twenties. He was 6" 1"

The man had blending features not distinguishing themselves from each other and his own overall appearance.

He was in what looked like to be a hangar for machines and vehicles, mostly just jeeps and armored vans.

The man said lighting a cigarette to the only other soldier in the room, the soldier was wearing white armor signifying that he was an elite. "I heard about the attack on Lewis in Eastern Shinjuku, Gamma's going to get stewed for letting a Mega into the city, making us look like dumb assholes."

The elite said laughing practicing his stance "If me and you were there I would have loved to catch that Piedmon or whatever it was, story is that it was a Mega level, thankfully Ace Kamen was there, that tamer, he succeeded where Lewis' bodyguards didn't."

The buzz cut hair man was not paying much attention as he was cleaning his rifle, this made the elite ask annoyed "Hey Shaun you even listening?"

The man with the buzz cut was 'Shaun Ryan', the X.A.C director of the Western sector of Shinjuku.

Shaun said jokingly "Yeah I heard you, sorry I wasn't looking when you were talking to me, too busy keeping my favorite gun in shape."

The elite said sighing, looking away he spoke "Whatever...oh yeah! That's right, did you also hear the tamer actually saved Lewis?"

Shaun said slightly surprised "Why would a tamer save an X.A.C? No less than the secondary Dictator too? ...The tamers and all Digimon lovers hate us for what we do, but they'll never understand that it's not what we 'want', it's what has to be done for the greater good, for the entire human race, if there were Digimon all over the world I don't think the Digimon would just sit back and let themselves be tamed by kids."

The elite agreed leaning back against the bonnet of the closest jeep.
11111111111.title: Talk among the ranks

111111111111.content:
Ace led them through a gate in the park to see his old house in a secluded part of the digimon world like an oasis in a desert. The three elementals were surprised to see a mansion here in the digital world.

“My parents made that house and I used to come here during the summer. If you need a place to stay, you are welcome to stay here. There is more than room, but there is security cameras built in just in case someone tries to sneak in.” he said and they nodded.

“Thank you for the offer.” Wendy said hugging him

“I will need to be tested by you three and each of you has your own idea of a test. Use of my trump card varies in each test. Only me or my partner can use it. It could be a test of power, knowledge, speed, or a battle to see who would last the longest. It depends on your element and how you it.” He explained and they nodded again.

Ace walked to the bridge and spoke a phrase in ancient japanese. The sound of wind blowing around stopped and he motioned them to cross the bridge before him. They did so as he crossed the bridge and the sound came back like it was howling.

“I have a wind guardian around the house to protect it and I have to say a certain phrase before letting any guests cross the bridge.” He said

“If you don’t say the phrase?” snow asked

”Torn apart into nothing or something much worse.” He said

They made it to the front door of the mansion when he stopped. He looked around feeling something and he was not happy.

~is rika shivering rena-chan?~ he asked his partner

“Something wrong, ace?” frank asked

Ace turned to him and mouthed “In a minute.” Before turning back.

~Just a little why?~ his partner said

~Found a stress toy to use.~ he said turning to frank

“That little ice prick refuses to stay down.” Ace said pulling out his digivice and the trump card before sliding it triggering the effect.

“What is going on?” wendy asked

“Icedevimon.” He said as said digimon at the bridge.

“You will never delete me.” He said and ace just got more annoyed.

He started walking towards the ultimate before snapping his finger making his hand engulfed in flames. Frank was surprised to see this, but he thought it was the effect of the trump card he used. Ace jumped high in the sky before slamming his flame fist into the ground making a crater pushing his power into the ground making red pillars of fire erupt from the ground (like fire pledge from pokémon black and white). It was coming for the ice devil at a fast rate and soon he was engulfed in a large pillar of fire before it stopped. He was still there as ace wasn’t done with him just yet. A puddle of water was underneath the ice devil before it was turned to ice and entrapped him like a sincicle surprising snow now with the control.

“Now you look like one of your captives when you first captured rika.” Ace said still mad and cold hearted.

Swinging his arm down, brought a lightning strike breaking the ice before stomping his foot on the ground sending him flying into the with an earthstone fist uppercut.

“Cyclonic Squall.” He said before a windstorm formed cutting up the ice devil and surprised wendy.

After a few minutes, the storm stopped dropping the ice devil who is ready to be deleted by one more hit.

“Go on kill me. I’ll just keep coming back for her and we will have this dance again and again.” He said as if he was taunting ace and his eyes narrowed.

“Not this time. Mind wipe.” Ace said before the ice devil’s eyes went blank and drawn out his sword.
“Fire Rage Slash.” He yelled deleting the ice devil as it turned to data and he ended the card’s effect.

“That felt good to relieve some stress and vent some stream.” Ace said finally feeling like his old self with a small frown.

He walked back to the three renamon before opening the door. He led them in and used a spell to flash change into a different set of clothes. He is now wearing a black shirt, dark red shorts, a crystal fox necklace, and white running shoes.

“Henry and Ryo can tell the younger tamers after we are done here. All current tamers at the table. I have some news I need to share.” Ace said like a leader before leading the three renamons to the dinning room table. All of the tamers walked into the room surprised to see more renamon in the house and his partner phased next to him as rika with her renamon were the last to join them. His parents were in the kitchen.

“Ace, are those the renamon you are looking for?” takato asked

“Earlier this morning I was out for my morning cup of tea like usual when I sensed both a digimon and an elemental power so I tracked it and I found the fire elemental renamon.” He explained while motioned to frank.

“We had a chat at the teahouse before going to his house where I met his two friends the wind and ice elements.” He gestured to wendy and snow. Wendy smiled and waved shortly.

“Aside from getting their trust, they need to test me so I get their elemental card like it did for thunder, earth, water, and wood.” He said as they nodded before turning to the three renamon next to him.

“My friends have been here before, but only my partner or I can open the path across the bridge to keep you from dying.” He told them as they nodded

“Another piece of news like before the battle with piedmon.” He said like getting angry again

“It appeared while three man were walking on their way somewhere and it killed two of them before I got to it. Strangely enough it was two elite soldiers of X.A.C., but that’s not the worst part. The third person was higher up on the foodchain like a shark. I gave him a threat while telling him to run.”

“Before you say something like I should have let him die to the mega, I can’t do that due to a vow I made to my teachers during my training.” he said as his hands clenched into fists

“What vow?” rika asked

“Never let a man no matter how much you hate him for what they did die because you didn’t want to save him from death when you can do something to save him.” He said

“I hate some megas more than others and piedmon is one of them.” He added

“Something happened to your teachers?” rika’s renamon asked

“They almost died from using too much of their power and they said they didn’t my help, but I thought I should have help them.” He said and silence filled the air.

“Who was the shark you saved?” frank asked

Ace sighed before looking at snow.

“Your enemy from three years ago. The second dictator.” He said getting shocked looks from everyone

“I didn’t have a choice and I’m sure as hell wasn’t going to break my promise to my teachers.” He said slowing calming down
111111111111.title: Tamers Meet Fire, Wind, and Ice

1111111111111.content:
Frank said in disbelief "L-Lewis!? Are you sure it was him? What did he look like?"

Ace spoke up feeling slightly ashamed and worn down "He was wearing a white smart suit, a morning suit, and he had short slick back brown hair"

Snow said shocked to Frank "H-he's still around? That means we could get another shot at stopping the X.A.C!"

Wendy said happily "Ace found him! Now we just need to locate him again."

Frank said annoyed sighing "You think it's going to be that easy to kill Lewis? He's a cunning, slippery little bastard, he's always surrounded by a group of Elite soldiers too. Besides, they really aren't the problem, the main problem is getting past the three directors Gamma the Professor, Shaun Ryan the hunter and worst of all Viola Lambert."

Henry asked interested "Do you know anything about these directors? I've heard their names before but none of us know anything about them."

Frank began explaining "I'll tell you about them in order then, first of all Gamma is not his real name, I don't know what his real name is only that the nickname Gamma was given to him since he is a researcher of light radiation, he is responsible for keeping the Eastern sector of Shinjuku free from Digimon. But he also does research into Digimon, his research has proved to be invaluable to the X.A.C so it would hurt them if he was out of the picture. Shaun Ryan controls the Western sector of Shinjuku and leads the hunting part of the X.A.C, they hunt down Digimon and do things like sell them off, kill them or just capture them for research..."

Takato asked interested "Wait, there was one more director you mentioned, Viola?"

Frank said gritting his teeth "Then there's 'this' bitch! Viola Lambert is someone who I don't know anything about except she's crazily powerful, I can take storms of bullets from the X.A.C soldiers regenerating my wounds seconds after but Viola can take me down using only her bare hands, she's fast, not as fast as Wendy but Viola is better at dodging than her. In all my time fighting the X.A.C I've never beaten Viola, not even once despite the times when I had Snow and Wendy with me to gang up on her."

Rika asked intrigued "Isn't she just a human?"

Frank shook his head "She's definitely not human, I don't know how she's so powerful, it must be something one of Gamma's scientists did to her to make her so powerful. Anyway if you come across her she has blonde hair and looks to be in her early twenties, stay away from her and by no means piss her off."

Ace asked looking over to Frank "So this Xeno affinity corporation, did it grow overnight when I was away training in the last three years?"

Henry spoke up analyzing the situation "No...they were around for a lot longer than that, they may have even been around since the first Digimon appeared. It's only after the D-Reaper was defeated that they gained fame."

Frank said pissed off to Ace "If you had just killed him back there the X.A.C would be leaderless! How are you going to sleep at night knowing you let the man that butchers Digimon everyday live!?"

Ace groaned and said irritated "It's not like that, I made a vow, I had a choice, either break a vow I made to my teachers or let some guy I'd never met before live."

Snow said annoyed to Ace "Do you even know the crisis' that could have been avoided if you had just killed him?"

Wendy said trying to break it up "Guys calm down, we can stop him ourselves."

Frank said raising his voice to Wendy "We can't kill him because we don't stand a chance! If it's not his Elites that murder us it'll be Viola or Shaun's squad!"

Snow said standing in between them "Will you two just calm down!? We'll figure something out."

Wendy said faithfully "I know we can do it, we just need more people this time so we can get past Viola."

Snow spoke up sighing that she broke it up "Maybe we could distract Viola or something? We just need a plan."

Frank pleaded interested "Guys...would you help us stop the X.A.C? We might be able to do it if we all pitched in."
1111111111111.title: The Conversation

11111111111111.content:
Ace looked at his friends who nodded and he smiled.

“One thing when I make a threat, it becomes a promise and I don’t break them.” He said

“That is the only exception to my vow and I have two conditions.” He said

“What are they?” snow asked

“You train with us as a team is the first one and the second one is you live here with us.” He said surprising them.

“What about our house?” wendy asked

“They know you three live there so what better chance to live where they can’t find you.” He said

“Anything else you want to add?” snow asked

“No those are the terms, but outside of that I want your trust and friendship.” Ace said holding his hand out
