The three looked at him thinking it over before frank shook his hand agreeing to the deal and the team was formed. Ace smiled and nodded before taking the ten cards out from his deck case. He threw them onto the table as they formed a ring and the cards started to glow their element with darkness glowing purple. An arrow appeared on the thunder card while it with water, wood, and earth had a small glowing white orb above them.

“That is the test clock for my next test from one of you and it won’t be light sense she will need training to control her new power.” Ace explained all of them were surprised to see this.

“How did you do that?” wendy asked looking at the clock.

“By channeling a bit of my energy into the cards and they do the rest.” He explained.

There was barking and ace know it was kits and vixy coming. He turned to see them and they were running around him. He chuckled before pulling out his other digivice.

“ Kits and Vixy dna digivolve to……..” they said

“Twiight renamon.” The renamon said

“Can I help you too, owner?” twilight asked surprising all of them, but ace.

“I plan another trick for the crystal mode and sun warrior mode with you and my partner. So you will be helping me.” He said and twilight hugged him tightly.

“Thank you, owner.” Twilight said

“I know I should call you ace, but you are our owner.” Twilight said and ace nodded

“You are like family to me, not pets.” He said and twilight hugged him even tighter.

Ace puffed into smoke before ace reappeared in the room surprising the three elemental renamon.

“Don’t ask. I need to have some surprises.” He told them and they nodded

“I feel like testing this viola and using my slide evolution with twilight crystal renamon.” He said with both renamon nodding.

“Before you say you have to help me or something like no, I trained for 3 years and I had more training within that time like I have 5 or 10 years of training in 3 years. I have more power than what you see and they know it’s true.” Ace said pointing to the tamers and rika nodded.

“From what I know about him, ace is stronger than all of us, but he is glad to have us to help him.” She said

“I need a real challenge to use my full power and the only problem is that I might get exhausted from forcing my body to use the power.” He said looking at his body.

“What about using the family card to unseal power you kept away?” kenta asked adjusting his glasses.

“Wouldn’t work.” Ace said

“With that much power, my control over my body would shot to hell and it be better if I do through force.” He added

“My body would adjust to the burst and that increases my control.” He explained

His cellphone started to ring and he had his teacher’s cell set to the first season of digimon theme song. his eyes widen before answering his phone. They saw his reaction and knew it must be important to him.

“Thank you for keeping your vow to us, but we know about the piedmon. Good job ending it quick.” One of his teachers said after ace put it on loudspeaker.

“For the child with the power of the knight to obtain the power of the warrior of the sun, he must gain all of the elements from foxes of that element. Howling wind and striking thunder, fading darkness and shining light, burning fire and freezing ice, and finally changing earth, running water, and growing wood. Well done getting water, wood, earth, and thunder. Finding ice, fire, and wind just after getting home is no small feat.” The other teacher said

“Thank you mentor.” Ace said with a slight bow.

“Teacher, is there a reason you called us?” ace’s renamon asked

“Yes, we will leaving our training to travel some and we might see you where the first kids got digimon.” He said surprising them

“Have you ever thought of this Viola Lambert person having a reason for joining the digimon killers?” his other teacher asked

“What reason would she need when she kills digimon?” snow asked

Ace was thinking for a minute like he was in her shoes before snapping his fingers.

“Personal reason like she is looking for something.” He said surprising them

“Sounds like you are catching to our method of thinking quicker than expected.” One teacher said with a chuckle

“Ace, I think you would be best to see about getting her to turn on her team. Something may be hiding in the shadows.” The other teacher said before the call ended.

“What does that mean?” wendy asked

“Someone made her who she is and why she is looking for the truth.” He said before a bell chiming.

They looked at the clock to see the arrow moving from thunder spinning around before slowing down on wind. Ace smiled knowing who will be testing him and he looked at wendy.

“I hope you are ready for the hurricane.” Ace said and she chuckled

“Please I’m one with the wind so you won’t beat me.” She said.

“After I pass you up and win your test, I will be halfway done.”

The wind card glowed before floating up and there was a flash of light. Everyone was teleported to a green forest with faint breeze blowing. Ace used his trump card to make another set of clothes appeared on his body.

“Can’t see them or feel them, but they are still there.” He said to himself taking off the extra set of clothes before dropping them on the ground making a crater.

“Weighted clothes are good for training, but not used for testing unless for stamina or endurance like earth and wood.” He said and they were sure surprised to see a medium-sized crater from the weight of the clothes.

Ace smiled before taking off his shirt revealing his muscles and there some blushing girls, but snow was slightly blushing.

“Stare at me any longer pineapple head and I would get the feeling you would jump me when I’m not looking.” Ace said with a cool voice and rika turned away blushing both angry and embarrassed.

The boy tamers were laughing while jerry was giggling.

Ace was finally ready for the test after putting on ninja sandals and leaving the shirt off for rika’s pleasure.

“Wendy, what is the test?” ace asked serious and ending the card’s effect.
11111111111111.title: Team Forms and Test decided

111111111111111.content:
Wendy said pointing at a relatively short mountain half a mile to the East. "Beat me to the pinnacle of that mountain!"

Ace said looking down thoughtfully "So it's a test of swiftness ability and motion. Fine, let's do this."

They both knelt down on their knees, after a tense five seconds of waiting Wendy shouted aloud "GO!"

They both burst out sprinting past everyone leaving a literal storm of dust behind them surprising everyone.

Snow asked Frank jokingly "You think he can beat Wendy in pure speed?"

Frank said closing his eyes "Not likely without getting lucky or cheating...but nothing is known for sure so we'll see how this turns out."


Up ahead...


Ace and Wendy were closely running besides each other at breakneck speed, the way this was going the race would be over very soon.

Wendy said still full of energy loudly "You look like you're running out of breath!"

Ace said annoyed hiding his fatigue "That's what you think!" (I can't keep running for too long at this level of speed, my condition is worsening, the mountain is so close!)

Ace took a sip from his flask quickly putting it away again he kept running.

Wendy said as they were already about halfway towards the mountain "I'm not letting you win!"

Wendy gained a massive burst of speed passing him making Ace give it his all

Ace and Wendy were neck and neck close but both of them were really feeling it now, more so Ace than Wendy since he never had to run this fast before since training.

They reached the mountain and began storming up it, Wendy swung her sword at him sending a blade of wind at him making him jump over it to dodge.

Ace yelled annoyed catching up to her "Hey! Cheater!"

Wendy said laughing "I never said we weren't allowed to slow each other down."

Ace said trying his best not to cheat "Cheating is for the weak and mischievous, I'm guessing you're the mischievous type."

Wendy said as they were almost at the top "That's right!"

They were about to reach the pinnacle as they were closer than ever, Ace let out one final burst of speed he saved for the end as the stress of running this fast for so long slowed Wendy down he reached the top.

Ace said looking down at Wendy who was now panting "You shouldn't have held back, why didn't you use your full speed?"

Wendy said annoyed at losing "Because that wouldn't have been fair, besides, a human could never beat me if I was using the full power of my speed. But I lost, so you can have my trust, my friendship and my power for your digivolution."

Ace said thanking her "Thanks... I have to admit even though this was the shortest test any elemental renamon has given me it was one of the hardest since you were only inches from beating me."

Wendy said standing up straight stretching her back "Yeah, you did well, also what would have happened if I 'did' beat you?"

Ace spoke up "Then I would have trained some more, came back to you and would have taken your test again."

Wendy said as the wind card appeared in her hand as she handed it over "Then go with the wind, you won't lose with my power by your side with this card you can outrun the fiercest of Digimon...Or just dodge them if that's your thing."

Ace said thanking her taking the card and putting it into his deck "Thanks, I'll use it when I need to get out of a sticky situation or run to save someone."

They began walking back admiring the forest and eventually they were back to everyone who were just talking to each other about appropriate things.

Rika asked as Kenta watched closely "Who won?"

Wendy pointed to Ace shocking Frank and Snow.

Frank and Snow looked at each other making Frank ask Wendy amazed "Did you not use your full power?"

Wendy shook her head "No, that wouldn't have been fair, at least that's what I believe. If he didn't use his trump card I wouldn't use my full power."

Ace said still panting stretching out his arms "It was a very close one, she almost beat me, plus she cheated a little bit but..."

Wendy said protesting "It didn't even slow you down so there was no reason to mention it, besides you dodged my 'wisp of wind' attack just fine."

Ace said pulling out the wind card which was now glowing, showing it off victoriously to his partner renamon "Look at it, how it glows with power, it's just magical isn't it? Using this card will give me the ability to move freely, dodge and sprint light as a feather far more effectively letting me keep up with almost anything."

His partner said amazed "I didn't think you would beat her first time... But you did, amazing performance."

Ace said as everyone walked back through the portal back into the living room of the mansion "We're done here, let's go back."


A few minutes later of everyone discussing...


Ace said laying down all ten of the cards "Let's see what's next."

The wind card now had a glowing white orb over it signifying it has been conquered.

None of the cards were glowing except darkness glowing purple, Ace said after looking them over "*Sigh*... I guess you guys aren't ready to test me yet, that's what the cards tell me anyway. You guys will have to train until you can give me a fair test. Plus I need to find..."

He looked over the cards as metal and darkness were glowing purple signifying they have not been located yet.

Ace asked Frank interested "These cards are telling me I am no where near finding the Darkness or Metal renamon...I'll have to keep that in mind and keep a close eye on these two cards, who knows? ... They could even be dangerous or possibly allied with the X.A.C. You never know."
111111111111111.title: The test of swiftness

1111111111111111.content:
Ace was looking at the ring of cards before pulling out some more cards from his deck case. All of them were watching him with interest. He pulled out four cards before laying them on the table.

“Armor of Stone.” He said putting said card above the earth card.

“Forest in Bloom.” Putting the card above the wood card

“Wall of Maelstroms.” Doing the same to the water card

“Field of Thunder.” He said like before to the thunder card

“Now this card need to have a name.” he said putting the new wind card in the center.

He was thinking looking at the card before a card floating out of his deck case and he caught it.

“Hmm?” he noticed it was his swift step card.

“Why are you out of the case?” he asked like he was talking to the card.

He palmed his forehead before putting it next to the new card.

“Swift step grants me or rena-chan a boost in speed, but the card is going to evolve into a new step all together.” He said explaining to the three renamon

“It was a minor wind based card when I was younger, but still around I was in the hospital.” He added and they nodded

The two cards started to slide to each other before they started to fuse into the true wind card and a flash happened. Ace was shaking his head from the flash before seeing the new card.

“Blur step and it has all of the effect of the cards that made it.” He said reading it.

“What was the card you got from wendy?” frank asked

“Wind of the Four Seasons would work, but not likely.” He said before putting the card above the wind card.

“Five left to get, three to test, two to find, and one to train.” He said

“What does that mean?” kazu asked

“Light, metal, ice, fire, and darkness to get their cards. Light, ice and fire has to test me. Have to find metal and darkness. Light needs to be trained.” He explained as rika bopped kazu on the head sending him to the floor.

“Dunderhead.” She said as everyone was laughing.

“Ace, put your cards away and set the table lunch will be ready soon.” His mother said as he nodded

“Takato and jerry, get the silverware. Henry, Rika, and both renamons grab the table.” He said as they followed suit

“Kazu and kenta.” He called them before they were saluting him

“Stay out of the way.” He said and they face vaulted while the others were laughing

“Owner, should we help?” twilight asked ace and he nodded

“Ryo, stand here at this corner.” Ace said pointing to the corner closest to him.

“Rika and your renamon get to your corners. Henry, do the same thing. Rena-chan, you and twilight stand in the middle of the table long ways.” They did as they were told.

Frank, snow, and wendy were watching on the sidelines. Ace started chanting something like a spell with hand seals before stopping.

“Pull.” He said as they started pulling the table making it expand longer and wider. He went back to chanting the spell making it easier for them to make the table expand. After a few minutes, the table was long enough for everyone to have a seat and not get cramped, but wide enough for the food for lunch.

Ace hold out his hand and the cards came to it like last time. He put them in the card case before looking at frank, snow, and wendy.

“It may seem like a waste to use your powers on something trivial like this, but I’m going to need wendy on speed duty in case something really fragile falls and snow on glasses so the drinks can be cold without ice.” He said and they nodded, but snow gives a slow nod.

“Anything you need me to do?” frank asked

“I don’t think so, but I’ll let you know.” He said giving frank a friendly smile

The table was good and silverware was set.

“Ace, plates or bowls?” his father asked

“Bowls.” He said before the door to the kitchen opened and bowls came flying out. Seeing them using, wendy her power to catch them while putting them in their spot on the table. She didn’t miss one bowl and ace give her a hug.

“Thanks.” He said and she gave him a peck on the cheek.

“Welcome cutie.” She said smiling

The door opened again; this time beer steins came out flying and ace caught them all like wendy did by using his speed. He handed them to snow who used a bit of her power to cool glasses without damaging them. After they were set on the table, the table was ready and looking perfect. Ace was counting something with his hand before stopping. The tamers and renamons were out of the way and with the other digimon.

“Table is ready.” He said

“Good, lunch is ready. ” his mother said as ace felt something moving and turned his head to see terriermon, guilmon, kazu, and kenta moving to the table.

They felt something and look to see ace staring at them with a death glare. They see the demon mask from his crystal mode behind him laughing darkly.

“What do you think you are doing?” he asked slowly

“Taking our seat at the table?” kazu asked slightly scared of the mask

His eyes narrowed as the mask was showing its teeth making them cringe in fear.

“You are going to wait like the rest of us or you four will be helping with combat training and it will be hell.” He said in a low calm voice that scares them more than the mask and they nodded before running behind rika, her renamon, and his renamons.

The mask disappeared as his face returned to normal getting laughs from rika and the renamons. Wendy looks at him in thought. ~Maybe I can get him to teach me that so frank and snow can stop arguing.~ she thought.

His parents came out with large bowls of food, but it’s different ramen for some and other japanese dishes. The four tried again before getting caught by ace again and same result happened. Ace helped with the dishes before letting everyone sit down with the tamers sitting with their digimon and terriermon getting a booster seat. After a quick prayer over the food, bowls were getting filled and food was being eaten. Ace was feeling good to be home with friends, family, and people he can trust. It was close to an hour when all of the good was eaten and everyone was full to the limit. Ace and his renamon ate most of it and one guess why.

“I missed a home-cooked meal like that and it was perfect.” He said leaning back in his chair.

All of the dishes were put up in the dishwasher before his parents left to check on the house and left their partners to help with the mansion in case X.A.C. came to greet them. The table was put back to normal and they headed around back to the backyard where the training equipment was.

“Before I see the difference from three years in the tamers, Kazu, Kenta, and Jerry, did you actually train with your digimon?” he asked like they were his soldiers.

Jerry nodded confidently while the two boys were sweating nervously.

“Your old master taught me some and your father help.” She said and he grinned.

“Good.” He said before dragging the boys to some weights.

“Both of you will work with this set before working on the next set.” He said and they nodded

“Rika, you can watch them while my renamon takes yours to train her light power.” He said and they nodded before handing his partner the light card for training.

“Henry, you train takato in your martial arts before training him mine.” Henry nodded.

He used the trump card and meditate for a short bit too slowly release the hidden power in his legs for him to go faster.

“Wendy, I need you to help me train in speed training. Frank and snow can watch.” He said and she nodded

“I’ll be happy to help you with your training.” she said as they with frank and snow were teleported back into the green forest.
1111111111111111.title: Time for Lunch and Start of Working of the Food

11111111111111111.content:
Ace asked Wendy ready for training "So what's the training plan?"

Wendy spoke up a little confused "Um, I guess do what we did last time, just run to that mountain back and forth."

Ace was silent for an awkward five seconds and then said aloud "I thought you were going to help me."

Wendy said pointing at his pocket "I am, you have my card don't you?"

Ace said taking out the card "So you're saying I should use this in training? That sounds like cheating to me."

Wendy said slightly irritated "If you don't like it don't use it then."

Ace said sighing putting the card away "Alright then, so I just run back and forth from the mountain back to here, over and over, so this should make me faster?"

Wendy said remembering something "Oh! I almost forgot, you need to wear weights when doing this on your legs or around your ankles."

Ace said strapping weights to his ankles "Now this makes sense to me. I remember when I used to run with weights on back when I was in training, seems like so long ago."

Wendy said happily ready to begin "Okay, when you are running I will be running alongside you, don't want to get rusty. This will be just like our little race except neither of us will be trying to outrun each other."

Ace asked interested "Aren't you going to wear weights too? It'll help you improve faster."

Wendy said awkwardly "I uh...I'm already wearing weights, they are just under my fur."

Ace asked intrigued "When did you put those on? I didn't even notice."

Wendy said looking down "I've had them on this entire time."

Ace's eyes widened and he asked befuddled "Did you have those on in our race!?"

Wendy said waving "D-Details details, who cares."

After that they began running back and forth to and from the mountain pinnacle with Frank and Snow watching, almost everyone was training in their own way...


Meanwhile...


Lewis was walking down a wide well lit corridor with many doors into different rooms, his four Elite soldiers followed, he walked down to the end of the corridor and signaled for his soldiers to wait outside as he opened a large unlocked iron door, he closed the door and walked into a warehouse filled with jeeps, cars, 4x4's and armored vehicles.

Shaun was standing across from the door looking serious as Lewis approached.

Lewis asked standing up straight "Have you heard anything of the blue phoenix Frank Bellows?"

Shaun shook his head, he then lit a cigarette and began smoking, Shaun then asked "I heard about the attack, was it really a piedmon?"

Lewis nodded, Shaun asked another question "How the hell did it get into the city then? Isn't Gamma doing his job?"

Lewis said sighing "I never know with Gamma, I can count on you and Viola but never on him, he only cares about his research, his scientists are worse, some of them are mad."

Shaun said scratching his head "Well Blackgate at least you didn't die."

Lewis said narrowing his eyes "Don't call me by my last name."

Shaun said jokingly "What don't like it?"

Lewis said annoyed at him "I wish you were more like Viola, she doesn't try to piss me off."

Shaun was about to make another joke until an angry, low voice interrupted them "Lewis and Shaun in one room, a sight to see."

They both looked over to see a black armored common soldier holding his rifle by the nozzle with both hands making the grip touch the floor.

The soldier was slightly shorter than Frank standing at around 5" 10

Lewis asked interested "You've got guts to just walk up to us recruit knowing who we are when we are in the middle of a -"

The soldier laughed interrupting him and spoke up loosening his helmet about to take it off "You've got it all wrong, I'm no recruit. Let me introduce myself since I don't believe we've met..."

The soldier removed his helmet dropping it on the floor completely making Shaun and Lewis' eyes widen because of his appearance.

The soldier was actually a dark grey furred renamon who looked similar to Frank but with paler fur and no colour in it.

The soldier continued introducing himself "My name is Arthur Bellows, I am the Blue phoenix's younger brother, I am one of the X.A.C's commanders."

Lewis said looking him up and down "A Digimon working for the X.A.C? This is...why would you work for us?"

Arthur spoke up "Because I hate my kind and my brother especially."

Shaun said dropping and stomping on his cigarette "Figures, I bet you must have some soppy story about how they mistreated you."

Arthur said with glee "Not exactly, I wouldn't call it a soppy story to begin with. Besides, it's not like it's any of your business."

Lewis spoke up as Shaun and Arthur stared each other down "I don't care about any of that, I just see the resemblance, you look just like the dog or fox or whatever I've been fighting for three years. I don't even know if he is still in the fight or even still breathes."

Arthur said picking up his gun "Oh he's alive, and I know that because he doesn't like giving up or letting his opponent get away, besides, I haven't killed him yet myself."

Shaun asked looking him up and down copying what Lewis was doing earlier "So you're a Digimon, what kind of power do you have?"

Arthur explained "I use my head." When he said that he chuckled to himself like he was hiding something or making a pun.

Then they both caught on, Lewis asked amazed "You have telekinesis?"

Arthur said pointing at him "Bingo, but it's more than that."
11111111111111111.title: Brotherly hate

choices: Still With Ace's Training: The foxes reactions.
111111111111111111.content:
As ace and wendy were training, his and rika’s renamons were in the light field so she can be able to test him and control her new powers. She had her started out making an orb of light using both hands while gathering light energy.

“This is easy.” Twilight said holding an orb of light in one hand surprising rika’s renamon.

“How?” was asked

“They are not ready to control their powers on their own, but their dna fuse can train in their powers.” Ace’s renamon explained.

“Vixy will be our vaccine counterpart while kits will be the virus.” She added

The training resumed as there was beams of light, orbs of light, and white fire punches and kicks. That was basic training.

“Ok, the next step to use your light to create shields, bend light around you to create illusions, and create a skill of your own.” She said as they nodded.

They got to work on their second level training with gusto. While they and ace were training, henry was training takato in martial arts, their digimon were training by fighting each other in a mock battle in the sparring ring, rika was watching kenta and kazu lifting the weight that ace instructed them to do, and jerry was training with her partner as they practice the lessons from ace’s father.

“Put your backs into it, you lazy bums.” Rika said to the lazy boys as they finished another rep using the current weights

“Rika, we have been at this for thirty minutes. Give us a break. We are not like ace or you.” Kazu said

“Can we get a break from this work out?” kenta asked her

She thought it over as she was tapping her chin in thought.

“Without your digimon and this training, both of you would be dead weight and not only we are fighting rogue digimon, but X.A.C soldier who use guns and other things to kill digimon.” She said and they hung their heads at the truth.

During school, ace didn’t really trust them as his friends while he was friends with the real tamers. Jerry was always hugging ace for saving her leomon from impmon’s corrupted form after she heard that the knight digimon was him. He saw her as a sister figure while they were only children in their own families. Ryo was like an older brother to him, but he didn’t trust him based on his history with rika. Kazu wasn’t really much of a thinker based on his play style in the game and kenta was more of the thinker for both of them. Now ace was the leader with takato as his next in command if he wasn’t around.

“You can have 10 minutes before back on the grind.” She said to the sweating boys who fell on the ground from their constant workout.

“You two will there all day if you don’t show resolve and results when ace gets back from his training.” she said.

Ryo with his cyberdramon were watching this as it was going on. He had to keep his partner in control since he spent most of his time getting his monodramon back to his ultimate form. Soon the two boys got back to work doing rep on the next weight in the set. They have more determination and resolve to show that they are not dead weight. Rika smiled knowing ace would have done something to get them to show resolve or pump them full of spirit.

~How much muscle do I want to get from ace?~ she thought about the question he asked her.

~Lean and well-toned. Not as bulky as he is going to be.~ she thought

~I could get bigger than normal figure since my figure is the average.~ was an afterthought, but that one will have to wait till when she and her renamon are in their room for the night.

She went back to watching them while trying to think about her workout with ace’s help. The boy’s arms are burning and they are sweating more than usual, but they are powering through the pain like strong boys. Ace is resting from running his 10th run from the mountain pinnacle with Wendy standing next to him slightly winded from their runs. The muscles on his legs are slowly growing bigger so he will get taller.

“That was impressive being able to run that long without a break.” Frank said looking at him.

“I had to train for long periods of time without breaks.“ ace said before looking at the weights on his ankles

“During that training, I had to wear a full set of weighted clothes.” He added before taking them off. He felt the trump card still active and shook his head. He already taken off the full set of weighted clothes, but his teachers would usually make him wear weights that would equals several hundred pounds. If one were to guess, it had to be close to 500 pounds. His teachers tested his body’s endurance and he can handle up to close 1000 pounds or on the mark. With his hidden power, 1 ton is the max his body can take before it gives out.

Using the trump card, he made a weight vest and four wristbands on his wrists and ankles. Taking the ones on his wrists off first, he threw them off making them land next to the first crater and creating a new crater before throwing the ones on his ankles making the new crater the same size as the first one. Sighing at the thought of his teachers, he pulled the weighted vest off before chucking it with the wristbands. There was a loud thud and the crater grew from the weight making it bigger than the first one. The three renamon were gaping from the size of the crater before staring at him.

“They were sadistic trainers and the training was insane.” He said folding his arms

He put the ankle weights back on before feeling a slight difference. Nodding in thought about the weights, he stood up before walking around getting a feel of the weights.

“How much are those weights” snow asked him

“First set, anything up to 500 pounds. The second set is around 1,000 pounds or at said mark.” He said

“Anything about a third set?” wendy asked before ace gave them a deadpanned look

“They tested my body’s hidden power and the max is 2,000 pounds before it gave out on me” he explained before getting ready to run again.
111111111111111111.title: Mass Training

1111111111111111111.content:
Ace continued running back and fro the mountain repeatedly while Wendy, Frank and Snow watched closely as his speed slowly but surely improved.

Frank said jokingly to Wendy "He beat you, *chuckles* I would never let myself be beaten by a kid."

Wendy said annoyed blushing "H-he's not that young, you wouldn't give him a fair test anyway!"

Frank and Wendy's eyes locked tight glaring as Snow backed off silently.


Later that evening at around twilight...


In a large executive office at the top of a tall tower in a X.A.C compound in Northern Shinjuku was Lewis Blackgate sitting at a large desk boringly waiting for someone or something. Shaun was in the room sitting across from the desk smoking as per usual. Shaun said puffing smoke "When do you think they'll get here?"
Lewis shrugged out of energy.

Two elite soldiers were outside the door standing guard

Viola walked up to the door but the soldiers stood in her way.

The soldier on the left said shoving her back "No visitors after hours, do you have an appointment with our Dictator?"

Viola said in an ice cold tone attempting to unnerve and intimidate them "What's the problem?"

The elites shook their heads as she tried to walk past but they jumped in the way again.

Viola started twitching and said hissing "Get out of my way."

The soldier on the right said giggling "If you don't have an appointment you can't see him."


Inside the office...


Lewis said quietly laughing to Shaun "I think Viola's here, but I told the soldiers no one was allowed in."

Shaun said not amused "You idiot she's going to ram them through the wall, you know what she's like."


Outside the door...


Viola started raising her voice cracking her knuckles "I order you to stand aside!"

The soldier on the left said shaking his head "We'd love to help you director Viola but we only take orders from the secondary Dictator. We can't let you in, orders are orders."

Viola said shaking with rage "Final. Warning. Move. Now."

The soldiers looked at each other and slowly backed off as she gently opened the door teething with anger.

Lewis said laughing "Hey was wondering when you would get here."

Viola ran up to his desk and narrowed her eyes staring into Lewis' soul "..."

One of the soldiers said in a bold voice because of the helmet magnifying the deepness of his tone "Is everything all right in there sir?"

Lewis said trying to calm her down "It was just a prank, calm your tits."

Viola grabbed him by the scruff of his neck & stayed silently staring him down making Lewis sweat bullets "..."

Lewis stayed silent and she pushed him back down against his chair as Shaun said looking over at her "Don't be too hard on him, he can't help it if he's a joker."

Viola said pointing over to him "I didn't ask for your opinion."

Shaun said lighting another cigarette "Jeez you're so uptight, this is why we don't hang out, you remind me of my ex wife, a real control freak."

Viola said looking from Shaun and back to Lewis "So this is who runs the X.A.C? ... I'm not impressed."

Lewis said getting annoyed "At least we ... I've got nothing to add, that went no where fast."

Viola stayed silent sitting down across from the desk folding her arms "..."

Lewis stayed silent as they glared at each other, Shaun could feel the heat coming from both of them.

After an awkward ten seconds of silence Shaun was about to say something as Lewis picked up a nano carbon fiber dagger while Viola smashed a bottle over and the two jumped up out of their chairs and held the blades to each others throat.

Shaun jumped up yelling pushing them away from each other "Whoa! Stop calm down guys! Don't let the stereotype of you two being ruthless murderous overlords turn true!"

Viola said dropping the bottle and sitting back down "..."

Lewis sighed and sheathed the expensive knife back into his pocket, he said sitting back down "All this over a joke. You really take things too far and too seriously Viola."

Viola stayed silent annoyed with her arms still folded "..."

Shaun said taking Lewis' side "Attitude like that doesn't solve anything."

Viola stayed silent again still pissed off "..."

Shaun sighed and said looking down "Still feisty and talkative as ever."

Shaun spoke up looking over at the quiet Viola "You always were more of a strong silent type."

There was a knock on the door as it slowly opened, a middle aged looking man poked his head in, he wore glasses, had green eyes and had a lab coat on, he had wrinkly skin and looked to be about forty five years old, he had short grey hair. Everyone looked over to him interested.

The man asked in the voice of the man Lewis had called in the alleyway "I hope I didn't interrupt anything, I heard a lot of shouting."

Lewis asked interested "Gamma! How did you get past my two soldiers?"

Gamma spoke up walking in and sitting down "They just let me in."

Lewis said scratching his head about it "Never mind all that, I brought you all here to discuss about the Piedmon attack, first off... Gamma... How did it get past your forces?"

Gamma spoke up nervously "It wasn't my fault, the Digimon on the outskirts of Shinjuku launched a surprise assault, I guess one of them must have slipped by the gate."

Lewis said putting down some sheets of paperwork "Look at this mess, I've had to write this up to keep the press and authorities off of me because of you and your useless men screwing this up! Not to mention I almost got killed!"

Gamma said laughing "You wouldn't just die like that, fate wouldn't allow it."

Viola spoke aloud shocking everyone "Dictator has a message for all of you..."

Everyone's eyes widened knowing she isn't one to joke about things like this

Shaun muttered "D-Dictator? The primal Dictator? The one that is said to not exist?"

Viola nodded and continued "The primal Dictator has ordered the death or execution of Frank Bellows and anyone assisting him, no matter what they must all be killed off."
1111111111111111111.title: The silence of the X.A.C

11111111111111111111.content:
Ace finished another 90 runs before stopping and finished off his flask. He fell to his knees breathing hard and snow was helping him stand.

“You can lean on me.” She said and he did as told.

“Wendy, when I’m done with training I want a rematch.” He said and they were looking at him slightly surprised.

“Why? You have my card.” She said

“To test my speed after releasing my hidden power in my legs and my control.” He said

“I want to see the speed of the wind and surpass it. My body has been adjusting to the hidden power since we left our teachers and only my limbs are what’s left.” He added

“Frank, don’t underestimate me and don’t assume I’m an easy win. You will lose if you do.” Ace said looking at him

A portal to the others opened up and they walked out of the forest of wind card. As they walked out, they see another portal open and the three renamons from the light room walked out.

“Rena-chan, have you removed your weights yet?” ace asked his partner

“No, but I will when I need to get serious.” She said smirking

“Those damned sadists put too much weight on us. I mean who would put 2,000 to 3,000 pounds of weight on a kid and expect him to handle it.” He said shocking everyone there.

“I already had to take off the second set before finishing 100 runs to the mountain. I barely felt a difference from the weights wendy gave me, but that is only for my control issue.” He added

“It was hard at first, but we managed it.” She said

“Hard? I had to force my body to move and it puts too much strain on me. 2,000 pound is the limit on my body for the forced power.” He said

“You had at least 1,000 on each limb and 2,000 on your torso. You had it worse than me. If you didn’t have all that data we have been collecting since we met, then you would have been stuck.” He said dropping another bomb on them.

“If 2,000 was your limit, then what is it going to be after your power has been released?” she asked

“I really don’t want to find out, but I have to guess. Either twice or three times as much of that.” He said

Something came across his mind as his eyes narrowed.

“I get the feeling that we will have to be careful around those four leaders.” Ace said

“Why?” rika asked him

“If we get caught helping frank and his friends, it might kill us.” He said

“The younger tamers are staying here for training.”

He was thinking of something while everyone else was surprised except for his partner.

“It might be too soon for that big of a change.” Ace said

“How big of a change?” frank asked

“City wide area.” He said

“You only done small changes compared to this.” His partner said

“I need to do something a little bigger.” He said

“Like what?” snow asked

“Using invisibility.” He said

“Like becoming invisible people?” kazu asked

“In a way or invisible digimon.” Ace said

He looked at his watch before sighing.

“Time for me to get dinner ready.” He said before walking to the kitchen.

“You need help?” wendy asked him

“Nope. Just leave everything to me.” He said before using the wind card on himself.

“I think it’s best if we stay here and away from table.” Rika said

“Why?” kazu asked

“Ryan used his new speed card so you would be in the way.” Ace’s renamon said

Five minutes passed before a blur shot out of the kitchen and going around the table. The table was being set within seconds and it went back into the kitchen. Another five minutes passed before it shot out again around the table once leaving a big covered silver platter on the table and going back into the kitchen. Kazu looked at the platter before looking at kitchen waiting to see if ace would come out to stop him. A few minutes passed and nothing happened as of yet, but he stayed put to see if he would pop out again. Ace came out putting some more dishes on the table with food on them and everyone had plates instead of bowls.

“You can come the table.” He said as he was going back into the kitchen.

They went to the table to see different food in bowls and they looked at the covered platter.

“I wonder what is under there.” Takato said

“One way to find out.” Kazu said lifting the lid of the platter reveal a pig’s head with an apple in its mouth. There was surprised screams in the room and ace was laughing in the kitchen. Not even his partner knew about this and ace came out with another covered platter. Using the still active trump card, he made it fade away and teleport it to the second dictator with a note: ‘You owe me and here a surprise’. It was covered so it wouldn’t ruin the surprise.

“What the hell?!!” rika asked as everyone else was trying to regain their nerves.

“With me, you will never know what is going to happen next.” He said

He pulled the lid of the platter to reveal a cooked chicken big enough for all of them.

“I think I need to use some old equipment I got from old friends before I left for my training.” ace thought out-loud. Rika and the others aside from frank and his friends looking at him surprised.

“You mean those five?” she asked

He nodded before letting them sit down and he was head of the table.

“Staff, Two pistols, two Blasters, a whip, and another staff.” He said knowing who gave him what weapon.

“You are really taking this seriously.” Henry said

“I have too so I can keep your families safe along with mine and prevent frank with his friends getting killed.” He said

“My parents can get your families and the younger tamers here, but we are the real fighters here. I will have to train my use of the trump card to make sure that none of us gets killed by them.” He added

They ate dinner in peace and ace went to wash the dishes before going upstairs to bed with his partner. All of them followed him upstairs to their rooms and the three got a room close to ace’s room by chance. They went to sleep as ace’s body namely his legs were still growing stronger so he will be faster. It was a peaceful night for all of them.
11111111111111111111.title: Dinner and counter planning

111111111111111111111.content:
Ace yawned opening his eyes sitting upright next to his partner renamon, he scratched his head and got out of bed getting dressed.

Ace opened the door and walked downstairs into the kitchen meeting Snow who was toasting some bread.

Snow said waving "Morning."

Ace said shaking his head "I think I overslept, what time is it?"

Snow said narrowing her eyes slightly "How am I supposed to know?"

Ace said jokingly "So you're the fiery one of the group aside from Frank then?"

Snow said awkwardly "That was ... probably the worst pun I've heard all year."

Ace said as Snow was buttering the bread "It's not much of a pun if it's true."

Snow said biting down on the bread "True, true."

Ace asked interestedly "So where is everyone? Are they all training?"

Snow nodded but then spoke up putting the toast down "Everyone except me, you and Frank, and some other obvious people like your parents."

Ace asked even more interested "Frank? Why is he not training? Does he think he's too good for it?"

Snow said laughing "Don't get me wrong, Frank is very powerful and he knows it, but he wouldn't be stupid enough to sit out training just out of confidence, he's out to meet a friend in Southern Shinjuku for some information..."

Ace said slightly worried "So he's in Southern Shinjuku then? ... he should be fine, Southern shinjuku has hardly any X.A.C presence, out of curiosity who is he meeting?"

Snow began explaining "You might have to keep this a secret but ... he's meeting an old supplying friend of his who is actually a X.A.C soldier himself."

Ace said shocked "No way! Is he positive it's not a trap?!"

Snow spoke up bogging down his concern "Of course he'll be fine, the person he's meeting with has known Frank for years, he would never back-stab him."

Ace said sweating still slightly worried and suspicious "Where are they meeting and when?"

Snow said thinking carefully "I don't actually know, Frank likes to keep these things secret."

Ace said looking down "I don't like this, I don't like this one bit."


Meanwhile...


Frank was in Southern Shinjuku in a dark, musty warehouse full of metal shipping crates.

Frank muttered to himself checking his pocket watch "Where the hell is he?"

"It's been a long time, Frank ..." said a voice in the darkness, a common looking black armored X.A.C soldier walked out from behind a shadowy crate and said with his gun in his right hand "It'll be the usual fee for any documents, weapons or information you might be looking for."

Frank said sighing "Don't just appear out of nowhere fashionably late you'll give me a heart attack."

The soldier said laughing in a bold voice since the helmet amplified it making him sound more intimidating "Can't take a joke can you? Now, before we get down to any serious business ... I will require the usual fee."

Frank said reaching into his pocket and pulling out some notes "Right, seventeen thousand yen. Here you go."

The soldier took the money and put it away with his left hand keeping a tight grip on the rifle in his right.

The soldier said opening his arms valiantly "Right, let's get down to business, what do you want to know?"

Frank asked grinning "Where are all four of the X.A.C chairmen going to be for the next month?"

The soldier said shaking his head "Can't tell you that unless you give me specific names, who are we talking about here?"

Frank said speaking up handing him photos of the four people "Viola Lambert, Professor 'Gamma', Shaun Ryan and finally Lewis Blackgate."

The soldier said making a joke out of it "So you said "chairmen" right? Viola is a woman ..."

They awkwardly stared at each other before the soldier burst out laughing pissing off Frank

Frank said gritting his fangs "I don't need your jokes, I already payed you so tell me what I want to know!"

The soldier said calming down his laughter "All right all right, let's begin."

The soldier pulled out for portfolio style folders filled with classified information on the four people in question.

Frank said putting the documents in a small briefcase "Thank you very much, now Peacemaker if you don't mind me asking aren't you taking a big risk helping me out just like the good old days of fighting the X.A.C?"

The soldier now identified by the nickname "Peacemaker" froze in thought for a few seconds and then spoke up "Don't worry about it, fighting against evil is all that matters to me ... now I need to go, call me again if you need any more help."

Frank nodded as they parted ways as Frank walked through the streets carrying the briefcase as the sun was glimmering up over the horizon as it was still relatively early in the morning...
111111111111111111111.title: Hello old friend...

choices: Rest of Frank's morning and ace's walk
1111111111111111111111.content:
Ace made himself some cereal for breakfast and he was thinking about something. He knows the trump card is still active and he hold out his hand over his right eye before sliding it over to his ear making a scouter from dragon ball z appear on his face. Taking it off and looking at it, he sighed before making it fade before destroying it.

“Most of my body has released its hidden power and my legs are still in the process of it.” He said

“Could you force it?” snow asked

“No.” he said

“That will either speed it up or release all of it at once and I will have to do control training to get it under control.” He said eating a few bites.

“Is the training that bad?” she asked

“No, just annoying.” He said sighing before finishing his breakfast and went to make some tea.

“My legs will be done about tomorrow morning or sometime during the night.” He added

“Any reason why you haven’t ended the card yet?” she asked

“Training my use in it. Each change I make uses a certain amount of energy from me. Small changes like making my sets of weight appear is a small change. Turning a person invisible is another one, but a group is a small-medium change.” He explained

“What is a big change?” she asked

“Like an area change. A city wide change might be one and a planet sized change is one step further.” He said

“I haven’t done a change that size because of the risk involved.” He added

“What is the of those two?” she asked wanted to know

“Uses too much energy or it kills me in the process.” He explained.

She nearly dropped her toast as she gasped from that little note and he looked grim at the thought.

“So far it has been easy with the small changes, but I have to make bigger changes.” He said with a smile.

“Mega levels are slowly becoming easy and I remember a machinedramon that was more annoying than anything else.” He added

“Maybe sparring with you three can give me a challenge.” He said and she smiled since he wasn’t calling her weak.

He drink his tea before getting another cup and pour some for her and he pour some in his cup.

“Thanks for the tea.” She said and he nodded as they finished their tea.

He grabbed the cups before washing them and put them in the dishwasher. He gave her a hug before gave her a small peck on the cheek.

“Thanks for talking to me, Snow-chan.” He said with a cute voice and she blushed before turning away.

~Kawaii!~ she thought in her mind.

He left chuckling at her blush planning to do some training on his own. Whistling a tune, he walked around back where the others are training like yesterday. They saw him too the back of the house where a backdoor is and snapped his fingers making a white door appear. He opened it before going inside and the door vanished. That surprised them except for ace’s partner who might know what ace is planning to do in that room he went into.

“Leave him be for now. He will be training on his own.” His partner said before going back into the light world with twilight and rika’s renamon. Wendy was already in the wind world, but she will see ace’s return from his room. They just went back to training as ace went to a cabinet and opened it to reveal several weapons. Several guns and two staffs in the cabinet waiting to be used.

“Your wait is over.” Ace said putting the staffs on his back and the guns on his sides.

Walking over to a shooting range, he grabbed his two semi-automatic pistols, which are like dante’s guns, ivory and ebony, but he added 26 inches to the barrel, made them both black, and added some parts from alucard’s gun, the jackal, to handle the recoil. Doubling the size of the mag, the weight would counter the weight of the barrel. He had his target, a X.A.C. soldier, in sight before aiming at the torso and unleased hell on the target. Anchoring his left foot as he moved his right foot back, he fired near 100 bullets in that one bullet storm.

After ‘refilling’ the mag for both pistols, he put them back on his sides before pulling the two blasters from his friends in space. Basically, they are the same model from star fox assault and he doesn’t need two hands for one blaster. His blasters have power and speed from both fox and falco’s blasters. He has a new target and it is a giant bug alien, but it a moving target. Charging one blaster, the shot is glowing red before orange and he fired the blast. It took a second before it made the bug explode and sent him skidding a few feet from the station of his shooting range.

“That is one nasty recoil.” Ace said before putting the blasters next to the pistols.

Walking over to the training ring, he pulled a staff from his left shoulder and it was krystal’s staff, but it changed to fit ace’s style. The gold spearhead of the staff changed to a trident head with a citrine in the center, the neck of the staff where the blue and purple were changed to red and yellow, and the key part of the staff was made a little longer.

He kept the original form of her staff in its small size in the jewel to hide it and going to give it to the rightful owner when he sees her again. He starts working on the stances with his staff before looking like he turned pro with it. He put it on his back before grabbing the other staff, which is a metal mic staff that can work like any other mic on a stand. Putting the mic on his shoulder, walk over to a stage with a karaoke machine and started to select a song to practice his voice.

Music: Still Alive by Lisa Miskovsky

I have changed
I have changed
Just like you
Just like you

For how long
For how long
Must I wait?
I know there's something wrong

Your concrete heart isn't beating
And you tried to
Make it come alive

No shadows
Just red lights
Now I'm here to rescue you

Chorus
Oh I'm still alive

I cannot apologize no

I'm still alive
I cannot apologize no

So silent
No violence
But inside my head
So loud and clear

You're screaming
You're screaming
Cover up with a smile I've learned to fear

Just sunshine
And blue sky
Is this all we get
For living here

Come fire
Come fire
Let it burn and love come racing through

Chorus
Oh I'm still alive
I'm still alive
I cannot apologize no

Oh I'm still alive
I'm still alive

I learn to lose
I learn to win
Turn my face against the wind

I will move fast
I will move slow
Take me where I have to go

Chorus
Oh I'm still alive

(I'm still alive)
