After finishing the song, he nodded before putting it back on his back and changed into his gear.

“Maybe I should talk a walk into the other parts of the city and see about testing my pistols with explosive extreme armor piercing rounds.” He said with a low tone before using the trump card to conceal his blasters and mic staff until he needs them.

He turned to the door and walked out of the room. The others stopped training to see ace walking out whistling like before and the door vanished again. He started to walk towards the bridge before stopping.

“Rena-chan, how is the training going?” he asked his partner.

“They are on the second level.” She said

“They can relaxed while we go on a walk into the parts of the city.” He said.

“I feel like causing some chaos for those digimon killers.” He added with a weird smile.
1111111111111111111111.title: Different style of training

11111111111111111111111.content:
Frank was walking back down the street he came from towards Southern Shinjuku carrying the briefcase with the documents inside, Frank walked behind a bakery in an alleyway and began...

Frank removed a few bricks from the wall opposite to the bakery revealing a small hole, he placed the briefcase inside and placed back the bricks.

Frank then began walking down to Northern Shinjuku, Frank thought to himself in anger (I'll make them pay, Viola, Lewis... I'm coming for you...)


Meanwhile...


Ace sensed Frank in the city, Ace said hiding his weapons with the trump card "I'm going out for some important business, don't follow me."

Ace's renamon knew something was going on but nodded nonetheless.

Ace used his trump card to teleport into an alleyway where no one could see, he walked out of the alleyway and saw Frank walking down the street, Ace walked over to him and asked interested "You're heading down to Northern Shinjuku? I think I know what you're doing."

Frank said sighing annoyed "Do you have to follow me when I wanted to do this alone? That's the whole point I sneaked out!"

Ace said laughing "What makes you think you would be able to beat Viola this time around? Why would it be any different."

Frank said pushing him out of the way "Because of three years of training."

Ace argued smartly "And who's to say she hasn't been doing the same?"

Frank said getting mad "I'm not worried about that, as long as her eyes don't turn red I'll be fine!"

Ace asked interestedly "Her eyes turn red? What does that mean?"

Frank said scratching his head "Years back when I fought her I would be almost evenly matched with her until her eyes turned red, I don't know what it is or how she does it but when her eyes turn red I don't stand a chance, her speed and power turn up to ridiculous levels and she beats me pretty much within an inch of my life. But after those three years of training I'm sure I can beat her."

Ace said folding his arms following him "I think you're overconfident."

Frank said laughing "Everyone says the same thing. I'm known for it."

After a twenty minute walk they reached the compound which was out of the way and a decent distance away from any civilian activity.

Frank said cutting down the iron chain fence "Don't get in my way, just kill any soldiers you come across and if you see Viola or Lewis tell me."

Ace asked confused "How do you know Lewis will be here?"

Frank said finishing off the fence with his katana Flashfire "Because a friend of mine I have working in the X.A.C gave me a few documents which I read up on, he's here on official business. I'll say it again, back me up or don't help at all, get in my way and I might hit you."

Ace sighed as they entered the facility, Frank slashed down the iron doors and slashed at the air sending blasts of flame sweeping across the area burning and knocking down all the present soldiers.

Frank said sheathing his sword "This is too easy, back in the day these guys used to be tough."

They continued on through the facility calmly as strangely there was no alarm set off or any signs of anymore soldiers.

Ace stopped at a door sensing something coming.

Ace said stopping Frank from opening the door "Wait!"

Frank asked annoyed "What the hell is it now?!"

"Frank Bellows..." said a voice over an intercom, Frank's eyes widened, he spoke up "Lewis Blackgate... I haven't heard your voice in three years."

The voice of Lewis continued "You must have someone working on the inside to have had this good of a break to find me so defenseless... or am I?"

Lewis continued from an unknown location "I have someone to deal with you, ARTHUR!"

"Yes, sir?" Said a voice from behind Frank and Ace, they turned around to see a soldier in full common black armor complete with gas mask and holding his rifle in the same position as before when he was speaking with Shaun and Lewis.

Lewis spoke up one last time "Kill. Them. If you can help it take Ace Kamen alive, the kid."

The intercom switched off as Ace and Frank had a stare off with him.

Arthur spoke up in a deep voice as the helmet amplified boldness "So you are Frank and Ace Kamen? I don't believe we've met Ace, but Frank Bellows? We've already been introduced."

Frank asked narrowing his eyes "Who the hell are you? I don't remember you."

Arthur continued "You know me all too well actually, you see..." His voice turned sinister and cockily as he removed his helmet shocking them both "I am your brother."

Frank's eyes widened, Frank said shocked "So you must be... Arthur Bellows, my long lost brother. Why are you helping the X.A.C?! You're a Digimon yourself!"

Arthur laughed gleefully "To get back at you of course. Now, no more talk, Lewis is leaving this facility as I keep you both here, but I'm going to do more than that, Frank... this compound will be your memorial." As he said that he raised both of his hands at them and clenched them into tight fists choking both Ace and Frank before they could react, Arthur said throwing them through an iron wall "My power is mind over matter, now come..."

Frank said getting up sore from the impact "Ace... get out of here and do whatever you want, this is my fight since he is my brother."

Ace protested getting up stretching from the crash "I'm not leaving you alone like this -"

Frank stopped him drawing his katana "Ace... Please let me do this alone. You would do the same if it was your brother."

Ace said walking off to find some soldiers to practice his guns on "Fine, fine, just don't take too long and don't get killed."

Ace thought to him through his mind (See if you can get him to join us if possible)

Frank thought back (That's the plan... but how?)

Arthur glided through the hole in the wall and landed gracefully in a dust cloud.

Frank said impressed "So you can glide with your power, amazing..."

Arthur said grinning evilly "I can do more than just glide blue phoenix, I hope you don't hold back against me or you really will die."

Frank asked narrowing his eyes "If I agree to fight you, you must tell me one thing... Lewis Blackgate is not really here is he?"

Arthur said laughing "You figured it out, no he's not here, he's in a disclosed location, only the three directors and his own group of elite soldiers know where he is hiding, now as I've already said before, enough talk, let's go!"
11111111111111111111111.title: The Bellows family

111111111111111111111111.content:
Arthur dashed right at Frank drawing his own katana which looked almost identical to Flashfire except instead of it being jet black it was gleaming white.

Frank put out his hands in reflex as dual streams of flame came forth and seared the entire room and Arthur along with it.

Frank grinned thinking he had won. He put down his hands as the flames began to subside he was rammed through the chest with the white katana as Arthur burst out of the flames unscathed! Frank fell down to his knees as Arthur ripped out his sword from his chest.

Frank grunted in agony as his wounds quickly healed "H-how are you still alive?!"

Arthur picked him up with his psychic power as Frank shot a beam of flame from his left hand the flames harmlessly curved around Arthur. Frank thought amazed (He's deployed a shield of his own psychic energy around him... how am I going to even hurt him with this power?)

Arthur said throwing him against another iron wall laughing "You are supposed to be my older brother? You are weak! Get up and fight me, brother!"

Frank got to his feet dizzy and in pain, he summoned Flashfire again and said narrowing his eyes "You're pissing me off..."

Arthur said turning around and raised his left hand and clenched his fist as a large iron wall was ripped apart and crushed by pure telekinetic energy into a heavy chrome ball "Let me show you my power, fall!"

Arthur threw the massive ball at Frank effortlessly as Frank had to think fast, he jumped to the left while putting up a wall of blue flame the ball passed through it smashing holes and tearing down walls all through the facility while on fire from the firewall.

Frank said jumping up to the roof through the holes Arthur made as a few groups of Arthur's common X.A.C soldiers watched "Catch me if you can!"

Arthur said bounding up to the roof in one jump by using his psychic energy "You can't run!"

Frank jumped back across after he landed towards where Arthur was landing, Arthur wasn't expecting this trick and quickly put up his sword to block as Frank swung down with massive force equal to three tons putting all of his might into one swing.

Arthur blocked Frank's attack but was sent spinning back fifty meters through a window and into an abandoned office block.

Frank jumped through the window following him Arthur jumped back up and looked pissed off.

Frank knew something bad was going to happen as Arthur roared with both hands pointed at Frank, Frank tried to run but then he clenched fists crushing Frank.

Frank was floating in mid air with his limbs and chest being crushed and twisted, Frank screamed in pain as Arthur kept crushing with all his might.

Frank summoned his sword and threw it straight at Arthur as he was forced to stop the attack and jumped to the right but the blade barely slashed across his left arm, Arthur grunted in pain as Frank got back up summoning his sword again.

Arthur said grinning impressed he was still standing with half of his limbs badly torn and some of his ribs being broken "You're still alive, I've only seen such toughness in Viola, why are you so resilient?"

Frank said barely able to stand pointing his blade at him with his right hand "I regenerate my wounds, what happens if you whack or slice an open flame? It just comes back right?"

Arthur said impressed again "You could be of great use to the X.A.C Frank, why bother resisting? Leave your other Digimon friends to die and join us!"

Frank said disgusted as dark blue flames appeared around him and he had a fire in his eyes "You already know my answer, brother."

Frank charged at him dragging his blade across the ground making sparks fly, he was a blue ball of fury.

Arthur roared clenching his left hand but Frank didn't stop charging even with his body being crushed.

Arthur couldn't believe he had so much resilience not even being fazed by the damage.

Arthur jumped up through the roof again like before dodging Frank's charge.

Frank stopped and ripped a hole through the roof joining him.

It was very windy at the top of this building as platoons of soldiers gathered around to watch.

Arthur yelled in rage with his left hand out feeling the fatigue from using too much psychic energy "Why are you insistent on helping these scummy monsters live?! Just join us! It will be far easier for you in the long run!"

Frank yelled back as they both rested to recharge a bit after having made a mess of half of the facility "I don't care what reasons or what you have to say to stick up for the X.A.C but don't feed me this bullshit that you don't have a choice or 'it's easier' this way!"

They charged at each other clashing blades in a power struggle.

Arthur and Frank's blades sent sparks flying in the clash, they bounded off of each other as Arthur growled clenching his left hand into a fist again, Frank knew what was happening as he jumped up over the grappling invisible energy and landed on Arthur! Frank held his blades with both hands pushing downwards into his chest, Arthur was pushing the blade back up trying to turn it around.

Arthur gritted his teeth and growled in rage "Y-you dog, so lucky, you'll die like the dog you are!"

Frank roared as he put all of his might into the blade pushing down "I won't let you or Lewis win!"

Arthur jumped out of the way at just the right moment as Frank completely destroyed the roof of the block by stabbing his sword into the ground.

Frank dashed after Arthur as he tried to run.

Frank yelled blasting streams of flame after him which he harmlessly curved around him "How much energy does that psychic power of yours take out of you huh?!"

Arthur was really feeling the pressure and the stress of having used so much power, he hid behind a wall in a dark alleyway.

Frank landed as the soldiers didn't bother fighting out of fear they backed away making a path for Frank.

Frank said pushing a soldier out of the way looking for Arthur "That's what I thought."

Frank saw a thick trail of blood leading into the alleyway, Arthur looked down and saw the trail and thought to himself (Shit, SHIT!)

Frank put up both of his hands about to unleash hell into the alleyway, Arthur immediately bolted out slashing his chest on the way out "Gotta go!"

Frank held his chest as his broken bones were slightly sticking out from the wound, Frank chased after Arthur as they were now both weak.

Arthur bounded up the side of a tower with some of the last of his strength.

Frank followed jumping from side to side using his sword to ascend by sticking it into the wall.

Arthur yelled having regained some of his power clenching both of his hands into fists stretching his arms up high above him "You'll die here! KNOW MY WRATH BROTHER!"

Frank stopped climbing not knowing what he was doing as the tower started to crack and crumble all over from the strain and force of Arthur's power, Frank yelled in shock struggling to hold on as the tower started to tilt left and right as windows were smashing into pieces all over "Are you insane?! You'll kill us both!"

Arthur made a throwing motion yelling like a madman as the supports holding the tower snapped and tilted to his right, they both screamed as the tower came down with them, Arthur jumped off slashing the air with his sword in pure rage aiming for Frank

Frank looked up and saw Arthur coming down, Arthur plunged his sword into his left shoulder on the way down hanging onto him by his sword.

Frank screamed trying to kick him off, Arthur ripped out his sword and kick jumped off of him leaving him to fall with the tower.

Frank clutched his shoulder, Frank was now a bloody mess and looked like he was near death.

Frank with the final remnants of his strength jumped off of the tower and shot streams of flame downwards towards the ground propelling him into the air like a jet-pack, he landed on top of an office block building, Arthur appeared in front of him laughing, Arthur licked the blood off of his sword and held it high above his head pointing down at Frank who couldn't even move or barely breathe anymore, Arthur had won "Any last words, dear brother?"

Frank stuttered out in unbearable agony "J-just... tell me... "why?"

Arthur stumped by the question narrowed his eyes and turned serious "So you want to know... why I do what I do now?"

There was silence as it started to rain Frank's pool of blood grew larger due to the water, Arthur swallowed and spoke up barely hurt at all "Years ago when we were a family, my father, mother, everyone; no one payed attention to me, no one loved me, it was all you and that bitch of a sister Sadie! I HATE you so much for so long, just for existing, being alive!"

Thunder arced across the sky.

Ace saw Frank from across a hundred meters from the top of another building, Ace quickly used his trump card but it was malfunctioning! Ace made a mad dash for him "No, I won't make it!"

Arthur said glumly "And now... I'll end that cycle of you living, then my sister... then my family if any more of them live... then ALL Digimon!"

Frank narrowed his eyes and stuttered out with the last of his strength "I won't... let... you do this! Listen to me!"

Arthur screamed spinning his sword for the final blow "I. WIN."

Frank closed his eyes... "UGH!" The sound similar to that of a bullet hitting flesh was heard as Frank opened his eyes Arthur fell to the ground, Frank looked up and saw a soldier standing there after shooting him in the back of the head with a heavy tranquilizer, the soldier said as his voice revealed himself to be Peacemaker, walking away "You owe me for this kid..."
111111111111111111111111.title: Secretive betrayal

1111111111111111111111111.content:
Ace walked over to frank before looking at the sky and sighed.

“They are going to talk about this when we get back.” ace said before forcing about 10 % of his hidden power into his body.

He picked frank up before using a new card called ‘Mental Note’ and touched arthur’s head

“Do you really believe that crap? I think you were brainwashed. Pull that stick out of your ass and really think your family thinks of you. I’ll be waiting for your answer.” Ace said taking his hand and curb stomping arthur’s crotch.

He took out a blaster aiming at the bodyguards without looking. They stopped seeing the new weapon.

“When your boss wakes up, tell him Ace Kamen left him a note.” Ace said and one of them nodded scared at the tone.

He looked at frank for a second and sighed before firing a shot at them seemingly missing them.

“Let’s get you home.” Ace said before kicking arthur’s crotch again and jumping onto another building leaving cracks in the ground and rubble.

After seeing the kid and digimon left, the bodyguards grabbed their protectorate and took him somewhere safe to recover. As ace was running them home, he felt his partner in his mind through the link.

~What happened ace?~ She asked him.

~Found Blaze trying to be sneaky, but we got into a fight.~ He said.

~Are you both alright?~ She asked.

~I’m fine, but frank got the crap kicked out of him and I’m going to be training even more now.~ He said

~I’ll be forcing my hidden power into my body.~ He added with a serious tone.

~Alright, but I’ll meet you at the gate.~ She said and he gave a mental nod.

“Hopefully this taught you that you can’t do things on your own.” Ace said scolded frank.

Frank passed out, but he heard what ace was talking about.

“I’ll be taking your place in this fight.” Ace said to him before finally getting into the forest where he saw his renamon waiting there for him.

“I ought to kick you in the crotch for the fight, but I know you had a reason and I know when you had to fight for your pride in that one.” he said to him before she got up to him and he released the forced power. They walked into the gate with him carrying the battered frank.
1111111111111111111111111.title: Next chapter

11111111111111111111111111.content:
Ace said the phrase and crossed the bridge carrying Frank with his partner renamon.

As he walked through the front door Frank got to his feet and pushed him away gently, Ace asked impressed that he could still stand "What's the problem?"

Frank spat out angry that he lost to his brother "I can handle myself!" he collapsed onto one knee as the gash on his chest made a hissing voice as a spray of blood escaped and stopped a second later.

Ace's renamon said helping him up "Any normal Digimon would easily be dead now, your resilience is impressive, even so you still need to take it easy and recover."

Frank said in agony but failing to hide it "Mind your own business, I'll kill Arthur next time we meet, just watch!"

Ace said helping him by letting him lean on him "I'm not going to give you a stern talking this time because I can see why you're angry, I'll let you calm down first."

Frank said as he bled more and more "You're right... I need to just relax a little."

Wendy screamed at Frank's appearance as she entered the lobby, Wendy asked in shock "F-Frank what happened to you?!"

Frank said getting annoyed again "Will you keep it down? I don't want the world and his mother to know I'm wounded."

Wendy said looking him up and down "You call this a wound? You're half dead! Here, come lie down in your room, I'll get you anything you want as long as you tell me how this happened."

Ace let go as Wendy took over and his renamon kept carrying him up the stairs.

Ace sighed scratching his head stressed and said to himself "If that soldier didn't betray Arthur then and there then Frank would be dead by now... why did my card malfunction then?" he asked himself looking at his wind and trump cards.


About half an hour later...


Snow knocked on Frank's room door and Frank said feeling better already "Come in."

Snow opened the door and walked in, she said shocked at all the bandages on him and blood stained cloth "Tell me right now how this happened, Wendy told me to ask you and check up on you."

Frank sighed and said in disgust "It was my brother, Arthur... he got lucky."

Snow said shocked "You mean the same brother you haven't seen in years and years?!"

Frank nodded and grunted in pain as his regenerative powers quickly worked their magic.

Snow said amazed at the wounds and amount of blood "I saw the trail of blood from the front door all the way to your room, he must be tough to have beaten you so badly."

Frank said annoyed raising his voice "I didn't ask for your opinion on him, keep it to yourself! Unless your dissing him I don't want to hear it!"

Snow said backing off and said sarcastically "Well sorry"

Frank sighed and stood up gently "I'm feeling better already, now if you don't mind I'm going to get started on training again right now."

He tried walking past her but she stopped him and said in dispute "You can't be serious! You're going to train in this state?"

Frank said pushing her out of the way "Problem?"

Snow said trying to stop him "Wait! Frank seriously you'll get nowhere fast like this! Just rest up some more!"

Frank said stopping in his tracks "Clearly you can see I'm pissed off that I wasn't strong enough to beat him right? I need to train so I can beat him when we next meet."

Snow said trying to calm him down "If you train without resting you won't be able to handle it!"

Frank said going back to bed "Fine, just leave me to rest then. I'll be all fixed in a few hours due to my healing abilities."

Snow sighed as he closed the door to his room leaving him to rest...


Meanwhile...


Arthur opened his eyes from inside a medical room, one of his Elite soldiers said checking the window for if anyone had followed them "Sir, you alright?"

Arthur stormed up headbutting the closest soldier knocking him out and said in rage about to explode "Where the hell is Frank?! WHERE?!"

One of the soldiers said backing off as another helped the knocked out soldier up "Ace Kamen took off with him, we couldn't stop him."

Arthur said getting angrier "I bet you didn't even try, you useless - why do they even call you Elites!"

The last soldier said speaking up "They call us that because we passed Elite training -"

Arthur said punching him down "I didn't ask, it was a rhetorical question!"

The second soldier said speaking up "Sir, Ace Kamen said he left a note for you."

Arthur heard Ace's voice in his head (Do you really believe that crap? I think you were brainwashed. Pull that stick out of your ass and really think your family thinks of you. I’ll be waiting for your answer.)

Arthur said grinning "He could never understand the pain I've went through, stupid kid. We're done here, let's go."

The Elites and Arthur left the room storming out...
11111111111111111111111111.title: The anger

111111111111111111111111111.content:
Ace had used the trump card, which actually worked this time to burn the blood inside the house from frank’s room to the front door. He went outside to burn the blood off the grass, bridge, the mat leading to the gate. He left to deal with the rest of it and he was thinking of something while controlling his anger that was growing. Seeing more blood, he lifted his hand while mentally commanding the blood to come to him. All of frank’s blood heading them here from the fight gathered above ace’s hand before it burned away with an invisible flame. He sighed before walking back through the gate.

“One mess cleaned up.” He said

A thought came to him and he heard what Arthur said. This made his blood simmer before walking through the gate.

~We’ll see about that, Arthur. We’ll see.~ He thought

Ace came back across the bridge and walked pass the other training tamers to an area used for what he is about to do. Rika was worried about him when she saw the look in his eye or felt the vibes he was giving off.

“Don’t pass that line.” Ace said to them who were looking at him.

“Ace?” Jeri asked

“I need to vent some stress and I need to train alone before having a talk with frank.” He said in a dark tone that carried a serious edge meaning no funny business and he glared at Kazu mostly who nodded his head scared of what ace could to him when mad.

Walking farther into the area, a barrier appeared to protect others from harm and ace stood at the X. Ace started to tense up his body as his muscles started to get bigger from expanding and there was an air of power coming from him. His renamon appeared with the others seeing the barrier knowing he had to do this. There was a faint aura appearing around him as he was forcing his power into his body making his muscles expand. He was slowly growing taller as his body was growing to its max muscle limit and size. He was gritting his teeth from the pain of forcing his body, but he able to withstand it. Letting out a built up scream, his body jumped to its maxed size and muscles making him look like a bodybuilder plus the same size as rika and the others.

“Is that your full power, ace?” rika asked looking at the muscles with staring eyes

“All of my hidden power.” He said with a cool tone to make her shiver from the feeling of power around him.

“I know you want to jump me now and make me yours, but I have to do this.” He said and she turned away becoming hinata red.

Kazu was staring at the now hulk out ace and he was rethinking about what he was going to say to him.

Ace jumped high into the air and a hole formed so he could jump out before slamming his fist into the X. The ground rumbled before giving away making a growing crater deeper as it grows away from the house because of the barrier around him. The speed of the crater getting deeper is faster than it growing in size. The house did shake a little before wendy and snow helping frank appeared thinking they were found.

“I thought someone found us.” Frank said still recovering from the fight

“What happened?” snow asked

“I was venting some anger, snow.” Ace said from the crater and they finally noticed it was still spreading out.

The three were shocked to see it and they heard his voice, but did not see his body so they walked closer to the barrier. When they could see him, they were surprised to see a maxed out ace standing in the crater he made with one punch.

“Frank, we need to talk about what happened and I need to teach you a lesson.” He said to him just as the crater was slowing down to a stop. The crater looked like a bowl at 500 feet around and maybe 1,000 foot deep from the looks of it. Ace jumped out of it before the ground was being repaired by his trump card and the barrier faded.

“What do you mean?” takato asked confused

“You’ll see.” Ace said

“How long will you last this time?” his partner asked him

“Till I feel like frank learned his lesson.” He said before the ring of card appeared floating in the air and an black arrow above the top card.

“Looks like it’s time for another test and another card.” Ace said before the ring started to spin.

It was gaining speed before maintaining it for a few minutes and finally slowing down. It stopped on the Fire card. Ace smiled before cracking his neck, back, and knuckles.

“I expected this somehow.” He said before they were teleported to the fire world, which was bright sunny day on top of a building in the city and a ring of fire around frank and ace.

“A test for me to win and a lesson for you to learn if I have to beat it into you.” Ace said to him

Wendy and snow were looking at them mostly worried about frank since he was close to being killed by his own brother.

“So frank, name the test.” Ace said to frank feeling really confident.

They were waiting for his answer as ace folded his arms on his chest.
111111111111111111111111111.title: Ace's Hidden Power Revealed!

1111111111111111111111111111.content:
Frank looked down closing his eyes for a few seconds, then looked back to Ace and spoke up as his wounds began opening up again from only being halfway healed "The test? You picked an interesting time to take the test when I am only halfway through recovering from the beating my brother gave me."

They were all quiet and tense, Frank and Ace glared at each other silently.

Frank said drawing his sword breaking the silence "I don't care if I was just beaten down by my brother. I don't care if what I did was wrong. What I want to know is why you care so much?"

Ace answered "Because we are working together, you and me are allies, because of that you just don't go off on your own and do whatever the hell you feel like at the time."

Frank said pointing the sword at him "I had no choice, if you had a brother you would understand."

Ace protested "It's not just that, in all the time I've known you you've been brushing people off and doing pretty much everything by yourself, you have to stop this."

Frank said raising his voice as the soldier was recording everything in his helmet cam with audio "Like I care, that's just the way I am, I prefer to pull my own weight."

Ace argued raising his voice as well "If you would just swallow your stubborn pride and work with us then maybe I could have helped you beat down your brother and this would never have happened and you wouldn't be in this state."

Frank began becoming hoarse due to raising his voice so much in his weakened state, he spoke up "His fighting style is a counter to mine 'and' yours, he fights with psychic ranged combat, you fight like me, we both like getting close up and ripping people apart, our ranged attacks are weaker than his."

Ace said making a good point "With the speed Wendy gave me I don't think he would have been able to hold me down, you are more of a beefy type while I'm a jack of all trades. Besides you almost beat him by yourself, adding me in then we would have won!"

Frank yelled popping a vein "I didn't ask for your opinion! Now onto the test... the rules are no dying, no killing, fight like your life depends on it, last man standing wins! Also..." Frank began calming down slightly "There is something you should know about me and my family; the Bellows family, the more emotional we become, the more powerful we become, that's the main reason my brother beat me down, he was raging and full of hatred while I was only holding myself back because I couldn't bring myself to kill my own brother or at least hurt him. Clearly he had a different mindset. That's why I think he beat me. And if that friend of mine Peacemaker didn't interfere I would be dead by now..."

Ace asked interested "Your friend? He looked like a normal soldier to me."

Frank spoke up seriously "I heard his voice saying I owe him, it was definitely Peacemaker, if you see him don't attack him since he's on our side. Now back to the test..."

Frank was clutching his sword Flashfire in his right hand while Ace became tense as they were about to fight.

Frank asked calmed down "Are you ready?"

Ace nodded, they dashed at each other as Ace threw a punch while Frank slashed vertically downwards with his sword, sparks were flying from the sword as it seared with heat

Frank said as they were in a power struggle as Ace's fist was now bleeding slightly from the cut "I won't let you win so easily, even in my weakened state."

Ace threw a punch with his left hand while his right was holding the sword back.

Frank drew back his sword and slashed at his wrist drawing more blood, he only scathed half an inch into his flesh

Ace's punch landed on Frank's blade as he blocked it against his chest knocking him back crashing into the roof.

Frank jumped back up with shards of concrete stuck in his back, there were about five of them jagged inside.

Frank said as he was bleeding from his back and Ace was bleeding from his fists and wrist "This is just the beginning, get ready."

Frank began dragging his sword along the ground making small sparks, then he started running as the sparks became flames mixed in with embers, this was one of the traits of his sword Flashfire.

Ace began sprinting but was faster than Frank due to his training.

As they became close enough to each other Frank slashes across horizontally leftwards as Ace used both his hands to block it the fire burned into Ace making him flinch and shake from the pain.

Frank drew the sword back and thrust his sword forward as Ace jumped back, Ace said as his wounds became gashes bleeding much more than before "That hurts quite a bit, but now I'm serious..."

Ace used the wind card and dashed at Frank and before Frank could react he grabbed him by the arm and threw him down smashing him through the roof, Ace looked around ready for him but he could not see him anywhere.

After a few seconds of silence Frank's arms appeared beneath him tearing through the floor pulling him down into the complex with him.

Ace reacted by uppercutting him through the roof as they both got to the roof Frank landed gracefully flipping over, Frank said as his sword burned "As I said this was only the beginning."

Ace charged at him with great speed from the card as Frank readied his blade with both hands, he sidestepped him and slashed downwards with his left arm slashing deep into Ace's back, Ace fell over from the pain stopping in mid charge and got back up again but this time with a large slash wound across his back.

Frank said as his sword dripped with Ace's blood "Neither of us have used many of our powers yet, I like that."

Ace said clenching his fists in pain "You're cockier than I remember, if you fought like this against your brother you might have been able to beat him and defend yourself."

Frank said sadly "I could never do that Ace, not unless I was as angry as I was earlier, he's family."

They both charged at each other again as Frank lunged in with his sword in his right hand as Ace dodged around it he grabbed him by the neck and choked him, Frank spun his sword around just like his brother did to execute him and plunged it down, Ace jumped out of the way seeing it out of the corner of his eye, Frank got up choking as Ace narrowed his eyes.

Ace charged at him again but this time a little slower and more controlled, he grabbed Frank's sword and punched him down three times, Frank grabbed his hand and kicked him back, he got up again and readied his blade.

They were both getting tired now but Frank more so than Ace, despite Ace's wounds on his fists, wrist and back.

Frank said breathing heavily feeling his recent wounds from his brother getting worse "You're doing well so far, but for how long?"

Ace said getting tired as well "Thanks, but I still have to make you see the errors you've made."

Frank and Ace charged each other one last time as Frank went to lunge again the wound on his arm ripped open making him yell in pain falling down, then Ace punched him in the face dead on sending him back dropping his sword, Ace punched his face four more times before Frank said stopping him "Again, you're doing well."

Ace asked looking down on him "Do I have to beat you more or are you going to try to change?"

Frank said ramming him off of him and with a burst of speed grabbed his sword "Make me. Pass the test then we'll talk."

Frank was now covered in blood from his wounds and Ace's punches to the face combined.

Frank said ripping the ground with his sword charging again making sparks fly "Come at me!"

Ace ran at him as Frank slashed again he jumped over the blade, landed behind him and kicked him in the back making him drop his sword again, then Ace blocked his punch and threw his own punch to his chest knocking him back down, Frank got to his feet only for Ace to jab him a few times in the jaw, Ace then axe kicked him down before he could react and began beating his face in again.

After about ten seconds of beating Frank coughed up blood and said about to lose consciousness "You...pass."

Frank weakly handed him the card, as Ace took the card Frank's breathing became erratic and he closed his eyes and fell unconscious.

Ace said laying him down "Thank you, Frank."

The ring of fire dissipated as Wendy and Snow walked in to help Frank.

Snow asked Ace worried "Was this really the best time for the test?"

Ace answered looking up at the sky as his hidden power left him and his body turned back to normal, his clothes were torn and burned or just covered in blood "Yes, this was the perfect time, sure he could have not been weakened and injured but if I just done it later it wouldn't have the same impact of him learning that he has to rely on his friends sometimes."

They walked back through the portal and put Frank to bed again for another rest...
1111111111111111111111111111.title: Stubborn showdown

choices: Wendy and Snow Talk About Frank's Test.
11111111111111111111111111111.content:
Ace used the trump card to heal himself and add a small boost to frank’s recovery speed to help him from the fight. Looking at the card, he sighed before holding out his hand and the elemental cards appeared. He felt the wounds fixing themselves before switching into another set of clothes and going through hand seals.

“Clean and repair.” He said as the spell took his gear and went to fix it and steam clean it.

He started to walk before he started to fall.

“Ace!” rika called out running to hm, but his partner caught him just before he hit the ground.

“All of his energy was rage induced so he has to sleep it off.” She said as she had seen it before during their training.

“Ice and light is left of the current group, but light isn’t ready yet.” He said in his sleep.

“Let’s put you to bed, ace.” She said putting the cards in his deck case.

She took him to their room as she vanished leaving the tamers alone, but rika was still thinking about ace.

“We can take a break from training for the two fighters are sleeping, but the two dead weight can keep at it.” Rika said looking at Kazu and Kenta.

“Why?” Kazu asked

“Because I had the feeling that you were going to say something to make ace glare at you and kenta needs more training.” she said with her hands on her hips.

The two boys sighed as the other tamers were laughing at them as they got back to working out on the weight sets. Ryo noticed her face and he knows that she is worried for their main tank of a leader, but she walked over to her.

“Rika, I know we haven’t have the best relationship in the past.” He said as she looked at him with a blank face.

“We know that you have feelings for him and you need to tell him.” He added as takato and henry nodded agreeing with him.

“Ryo, can you watch these two to match that they aren’t slacking off?” she asked him pointing to the said deadweight.

He nodded taking her spot and watch them as she and her renamon went to the roof of the house to think about something. There was a slight breeze so her hair was swaying in it and her renamon looked at her.

“Something on your mind, rika?” her partner asked

“Ace was there for me whether I want him too or not and I’m guessing that he heard me singing a song. He didn’t stop me and went on his way, but I think he knew I wanted to be alone. He didn’t have a digimon partner like the rest of us, but he was an honorary tamer until his digimon revealed herself to him. He was full of surprises and he never back down from a fight even when the odds are against him.” She said to her

“Sounds like you have fallen for him, rika.” She said with a smirk.

She gave her a halfhearted glare before sighing.

“What about when he called you pineapple head?” she asked

“That was his way to counter my wit when we have what he calls battle of wits.” She said

She put a hand on her shoulder and rika gave her a small smile.

“He became my friend by being himself and he help you by keeping me safe from the bully during school.“ she said as ace’s renamon appeared to join them.

“He is sleeping peacefully as twilightrenamon is watching him for me.” She said as they nodded

“Both of you know that I have a link with him and I was thinking back to our training with our teachers. I think they were asking what drove him to want the training we were going through and he said his friends were worth it to fight through hell and back. He would fight for me, both of you, and all of his friends.” She said with a smile.

“He doesn’t want regrets, but he was always thinking about the date in the cherry blossoms with a girl that he wanted to be at his side. He would some of the night looking at the stars thinking about what would the girl say if he popped the question to her if he asked her to be his girlfriend. He knew she would not say it in front of the others, but he had a feeling she would say yes when they were alone.” She added and rika blushed knowing he was thinking about her.

“There is one thing that our teachers said about the family card that I’m still thinking over.” She said

“What is it?” rika asked

“Ace would vanish and take form of his normal paladinmon form in the digimon world with no memory of his time on the human world in the royal knights. I think he would have to be saved by a kiss of a love-fallen maiden or a pure shrine maiden.” She explained

“Meaning rika has to kiss him or Sakuyamon does.” Rika’s renamon said

“That will only happen if ace has no choice to make a city wide change using the card.” She said

“He has a few last resorts in mind when using the card, but a few of them includes taking out XAC while removing himself from the equation.” She explained and they look at her.

“Ace might have forgotten a detail about the sun warrior, but I didn’t.” She said/

“What do you mean?” Rika’s renamon asked.

“Yes, he has to collect the cards to get the card form, but to get the actual form is that he has to fuse with the elemental renamon like he does with me and soon to be twilightrenamon if he plans to make two new variations of his first two forms.” She clarified.

“What if he has been planning around it?” Rika asked.

“He might be or have been, but I have been thinking of how to get it and that what our teachers said at one point.” She said shrugging her shoulders.

“I don’t read his mind when he needs to think about some things alone.” She said and they nodded.

She got up before stretching her body and several pops could be heard.

“I’m going for a run through the forest before going back to check on him.” She said as they nodded before teleporting off the roof.

“Have you decided what you will tell ace about getting stronger or a bigger figure?” she asked her tamer.

“Yes, but I still want to work hard add it so he couldn’t just give it to me on the spot.” Rika said as her digimon nodded

While everyone else was busy doing something, ace was clinging to twilight renamon like something was giving him a nightmare, but he was trying to fight it off. Twilight was trying to calm him down a little, but it’s not working. He let go before shooting straight eyes wide and breathing hard.

“Owner, what’s wrong?” twilight asked holding him tight still trying to calm him down.

“That damn dream again.” Ace said before getting his phone off the charger from a low battery.

“What dream?” was asked

“It’s nothing.” He said trying to regain his composure.

“Nothing? I felt you hanging onto me like your life was in danger.” Twilight said

“Can you get everyone back into the house? I have a call to make.” He asked his second partner.

“What do I need to tell them?” Was asked.

“They will find out soon.” He said leaving the room wearing his other set of clothes.

He walk over to frank’s wear he was resting peacefully while snow and wendy were patiently waiting on him to recover. Ace knocked on the door.

“I need to tell you three something.” He said opening the door into the room.

“What is it?” Wendy asked

“I need you three to be down in the living room. Before you ask me why, snow, I’m about to find out as well.” He said looking at said renamon

“You don’t know?” wendy asked slightly confused

“I have a feeling that my dream is the cause of it.” He said before closing the door leaving them to talk about frank’s test.

He started to call his parents on his cell phone.

“Hello son, how are you?” his father asked

“I need you and mom to come to the mansion. I had a dream and it was the nightmare again.” He said and they sighed

“Alright son, we will be there soon.” He said to ace before hanging up.

~Is there another one of the Kamen family and could she be my sister?~ ace thought as he went to the living room to wait for the others and his parents to clear this mystery.
11111111111111111111111111111.title: Rika's Talk and Ace's Dream.

111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Snow started off the conversation with Wendy "I can't believe Frank agreed to test Ace before recovering, what a fool."

Wendy said looking at the sleeping Frank "He is what he is, stubborn, light heartened, reckless... but I like that about him."

Snow said sighing "Still; performing the test of combat so soon, what was Frank thinking?"

Wendy spoke up enlightening the mood "I'm positive he has his own reasons, besides -"

Frank jumped up surprising both Snow and Wendy, Frank said looking left and right "Did I pass out?"

They both nodded making Frank ask annoyed "How long was I out?"

Snow spoke up to him shrugging "You were out for a while actually, but you've recovered faster than usual, if anything that fight did you some good, your wounds are almost all gone."

Frank said interestedly "I don't feel that worn out actually, so what were you two doing anyway?"

Wendy said awkwardly "We were waiting for you to wake up, we were just talking about the test and how you should have denied Ace and waited."

Frank said looking down "That's not important, now why were you waiting for me to wake up? Anything important?"

Snow said full of energy "Just that Ace wants us all to go to the living room."

They all walked downstairs into the living room...
111111111111111111111111111111.title: Swift recovery

choices: Ace has a sister?! and Frank explains the card.
1111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Feeling frank coming down the stairs, he noticed some of his friends coming into the door from training and kazu with kenta running from ryo and rika for a strange reason. He raised an eyebrow at them before seeing the two said tamers. His partner phased into the room scaring the crap out of kazu and kenta like a ghost. Henry, takato, and twilight came into the room last as frank, snow, and wendy came into the room as well.

“What is it, ace that you had to pull us from training?” Takato asked their leader.

“You are about to find out.” Ace said with a serious look on his face and gave some of them a chill running up their spines.

“It’s the dream again, isn’t it.” His digimon said, but it wasn’t a question.

“What dream?” Rika asked

“Frank, I gave you a small boost in your healing for the fight with the trump card. It was active during the entire fight.” He said to him before ending the effects of said card.

“What dream did you have?” Henry asked

“The same one that would made him call him parents.” Ace’s father said walking into the house with his mother. Their digimon appeared from their duties.

“Both of you do such great work; we should do something for you.” His mother said to their partners.

“You don’t have to. You raised us since you were kids.” Darcmon said with guardiangemon nodding.

That made everyone except ace and his two renamon wide-eyed and gaping at them in shock.

“Son, when we are done here we are going to treat our partners to something for their great work.” His father said as he nodded in return.

“When did the dream start?” His mother asked him.

“During training I think. I was started to adapt my control over the family card.” He said

“Subconscious control.” He father said

“Meaning?” Kazu asked before he got a few glares from the people that knew the meaning.

“I must have use the card in my sleep to give me the dream.” Ace said and his father nodded.

“Was there anything your teachers say about the dream?” His mother asked

“A dream that keeps recurring might come to reality.” Ace said

His father sighed before shaking his head and his mother was looking at him.

“Son, there is something we need to tell you.” His father said and ace stared at him with non-blinking eyes.

“There is another one in our family, isn’t there.” It wasn’t a question.

“How did you know?” His mother asked

“I have been thinking on the dream while waiting for the others and you to get here.” He said

“Ace, that person you keep seeing in your dream is…” His father said before stopping

“My sister.” Ace said and that bomb was dropped on everyone.

“You have a sister?!” Kazu yelled in shock

“His long lost sister.” Ace’s father said with a grim face.

“What happened?” Rika asked

“She was around 5 before she disappeared when we were having ace so she would be 18 now and to be a beautiful flower. We loved them both so she knew that she would have a younger brother and she liked having a sibling to play with. Her room was next to ace’s room, but she disappeared in the night. I still had the family card then and I was using it to find her, but something was blocking me from doing that.” His father explained as ace walked over to his parents still with a serious face.

“When were you going to tell me?” he asked in a low tone.

“When you able to handle the quest to find her and bring her back.” was the answer.

“She might be sending you a message, but you would have to work through the dream.” His mother said and he nodded

“I will have to see if I can get her to talk with the haunting voice.” He said and this confused them much like everyone else.

“Haunting voice like a ghost?” kenta asked slightly shaking.

Ace chuckled before shaking his head.

“The girl’s voice was hallow, but cheerful to have seen me. One thing though, I felt that the darkness element was close to her so I can get two birds with stone.” He said and he knew rika frowned at the ‘I’ in the statement.

“You are doing the same thing you scolded frank did during the test.” She said and ace shook his head.

“I was being trained to fight and find the missing part of my family, rika.” He said in a low calm tone

The tamers took a step back from him with widen eyes. Whenever ace was talking like that, he was set on something and nothing could change his mind.

“Takato is learning to be a leader in my stead and Kazu need to use that brain of his if he wants to be taken seriously. I won’t always to here to bail you out of a jam, but you did fine against the gulfmon the first time and the invasion close to your birthday.” He said with a chill of ice.

The three renamon watching not knowing ace, but frank knows ace will try to find his sister and they are slightly surprised to see him talk like that.

“I was too young to help out and not strong enough, but that changed and I have my own mission to complete.” Ace said before turning to the door and leaving the house for the forest.

Rika sighed before face palming her forehead and the parents sighed as well.

“He wasn’t always like this, but sometimes he has to do things on his own.” His father said like he had dealt with this before.

“Why?” Rika asked

“Pride and honor.” He said.

“Ace is a warrior fighting for something that he believes in.” ace’s mother said

“I felt ace had to prove something during our training with our teachers and he asked me not to help him when he was in an all-out fight with both of them. That might have caused him to use some or most of his hidden power with it controlled.” Ace’s renamon said.

“He sounds like frank if you think about it.” Wendy said with snow nodding and frank rolling his eyes.

Ace came back into the house before looking at the group. Something came to his mind and he had a plan.

“Either she is in the digimon world, taken by a group, or she used the card to make her teleport.” He said

“I’m going to see Arthur since frank’s plan didn’t work.” He said as said renamon was looking at him shocked.

“What makes you think you have a chance against him. I barely made it alive.” He said

“Who said I was going alone.” Ace said with a smirk.

“I’m only bringing my partner in case I need to use crystal mode.” He added.

“I’m going to train with twilightrenamon later when I get back, but I also have an ace in the hole.” He said smiling at the pun of his name.

“Before I leave for Arthur, frank, you need to explain the card and see how it feels to be beaten by a ‘kid’.“ he told him using his words against him when he beat wendy.

“Son.” His father called him and he turned to him

“I know dad and I will bring our family back while getting one back together.” He said nodding.

Ace hugged his parent’s digimon in a family hug.

“Both of you are like family to me and I would think that you would be the aunt and uncle.” he said before looking at frank.

“Well frank, what does the card do?” ace asked the more calm hothead renamon.
1111111111111111111111111111111.title: Next chapter

11111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Frank began explaining after yawning "The card makes you fireproof, gives you a regenerative trait, it allows you to manipulate nearby fire although there is a downside, the card makes you move slower than normal, about fifteen percent slower."

Ace said thanking him "Thank you for explaining, but it's time for me and my partner to go."

As Ace opened the door with his partner following Frank put out his hand and spoke "Wait!"

Ace turned around and asked as everyone departed back to training or whatever they were doing "What is it?"

Frank waited for everyone to leave the room and then spoke in a low voice sadly "When you find my brother, don't kill him if you can help it." Ace nodded and Frank left as the room was now empty.

Ace said to his partner opening the door and leaving the house "Let's get going then."

His renamon nodded compliantly as she shut the door.

Later that evening...

It was getting late as Ace and his partner were walking down a street in Northern Shinjuku.

Ace said to his partner sensing Arthur nearby "He's here, get ready."

Arthur was standing at a bus stop, he was wearing a full black XAC soldier uniform. He sensed Ace and thought to himself raring to fight (It's that kid that was with my brother! He's brought a friend too, a renamon?)

Arthur began walking slowly, then speeding up slowly, then finally sprinting down the street in Ace's direction.

Ace said to his partner jumping onto a tall building out of the way where there was less chance of civilians getting hurt "He's coming this way, he knows we're here."

Ace and his partner stopped on top of the tall building, the sun went down hours ago.

About a minute later Arthur jumped up to the top of the building and stood across from them.

Arthur removed his helmet and asked grinning "Why have you come for me? To get revenge for what I did to my brother?"

Ace spoke seriously "I came here to convince you to join us."

Arthur laughed out loud and as he stopped laughing he spoke up "And why would I do that? People like you and my brother disgust me!"

Ace asked interested "Don't you care at all for your family? All they've done for you?"

Arthur said annoyed "All they've done for me? All they did was hold me back for years, the best thing I ever done was disown them! That and beat down my worthless brother!"

Ace's renamon said trying to reason with him "You're a digimon yourself, working with the XAC in the end will just get you killed!"

Arthur said spitting "Like I care if they'll betray me or not, as long as I take my race down with me I don't care what happens to me!"

Ace and his renamon looked at each other, Ace sighed and said glaring at him "Then I have no other choice than to beat some sense into your head!"

Arthur said drawing his blade which was identical to Frank's sword but white "Bring it on, brat!"

Arthur made the first move raising his left hand and clenching his fist, Ace combat rolled at the perfect time just as he clenched to avoid the psychic grapple, his partner was staying out of the fight until he needed assistance.

Arthur said as Ace brushed himself off from the roll "You knew what was coming, you must have been studying and watching me and my brother fight."

Ace nodded, Ace charged him as Arthur did the same, Arthur lunged for him with his blade as Ace sidestepped it, Ace performed a roundhouse kick while Arthur shot a pulse of psychic energy they were both sent flying.

Arthur got up after Ace, Ace glared while Arthur grinned.

Ace made the next move jumping up into the air and kicking downwards, Arthur slashed at his leg just as he pulled it back and landed gracefully.

Arthur held his blade with both hands ready and waiting for him to make his move.

Arthur shook his head and slashed at the air horizontally as a beam like slice of kinetic energy raced at Ace, he ducked underneath it as it passed through and crashed on a nearby building

Ace thought to himself impressed (So he still has some tricks up his sleeve that I didn't see during the fight, I need to play cautious then.)

Arthur heard his thoughts and said jokingly "Play cautious you say? That's no fun. Now come at me!"

Arthur charged at Ace as he charged as well, Arthur put his left hand on the ground as Ace stopped running, Ace couldn't move, his feet were stuck to the ground.

Ace said smashing the ground with his fists using a little bit of his hidden power "So you can stop people from running away or chasing you this way, interesting ability you have there. But it won't work on me."

Arthur and Ace charged each other again, Ace faked out his movements by going right then left, Arthur swung down while Ace jump kicked him in the face knocking the sword from his hands, Arthur jumped up and clenched both fists bringing Ace into the air, his partner kicked Arthur from behind making him lose his focus dropping Ace, Ace got to his feet and charged Arthur as Arthur put out his right hand towards his blade, his blade came to him as he pulled it towards him with his psychic powers.
11111111111111111111111111111111.title: Ace VS Arthur

choices: Fire and Wind Card Combo. Round 2, FIGHT!
111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Ace stood up smiling at arthur getting a feeling he knows what to do.

“Reading my mind are you? Then how about you hear this.” Ace said before getting his thoughts into a random pattern and going all direction. This was starting to give Arthur a headache from hearing the many voices in ace’s mind.

“Frank still cares about you as his brother and are acting like him.” Ace said keeping his renamon away from the fight until he was caught in trouble again.

“I know I too have a long lost sibling, but she is the opposite of you and I have to find her for my parent’s sake.” Ace said getting stronger as his power level was rising.

“I was going to keep my real power out of this, but now I have to fight more serious.” Ace said as a ring of kanji appeared around him and his fire card appeared in front of him.

“Phoenix Blaze.” Ace said the name of the card before it vanished.

“That was strange.” He said eyeing the ring of kanji.

Back with the others a card appeared with the training people, another card appeared with his parents, the third card appeared with blaze and his two friends, and the final card appeared at the table with the ring of cards as a white orb appeared floating above the fire card. The other four cards appeared with everyone minus ace and his partner coming into the room seeing the cards in the center of the ring.

“Another fusion card.” Rika said as frank noticed the card he gave to ace

“But a five card fusion?” Henry asked slightly confused

The five cards fused into the new fire card and one of the old cards was one that rika knew by heart.

She picked it up before seeing the picture of white samurai armor with sakura leaves raining over the armor.

“Armor of Inferno?” She asked confused at the card before it vanished in a flash.

“Light and Ice are left before Darkness and Metal need to be found.” Takato said with the others except for ace’s parents nodding.

“Darkness is with ace’s sister so that leave metal.” Rika’s renamon said

Back with ace, he didn’t move from the spot in the ring before a card appeared in front of him.

“Must be the new one.” He muttered to himself.

Grabbing the new card and his digivice, he slashed it through triggering it.

“Digi-Modify: Armor of Inferno Activate.” Ace said doing his own stance. The ring of kanji turned white before rolls of paper wrap around him forming a ball. Ace’s clothes turned into black basic armor streaks of white and gold on his arms, legs, and chest.

Five samurai armors appeared as the armor of inferno was behind ace. He saw them and knew they help with the one behind him.

“Guess which is our path for you to take the armor of inferno.” A voice said from the red set of armor.

“Virtue.” Ace said pointing to red

“Light.” He pointed to light blue

“Justice.” He pointed to orange

“Life.” He pointed to dark blue

“Finally, wisdom.” He pointed to the green set of armor

“You have made the right choices and you carry our paths so you will be to wear the armor each time you use the card.” Red armor said as ace nodded

“Thank you armor-san.” Ace said

“Our companion should be with yours giving her the power of both white and black blazes.” Orange armor said

“Now for your armor, young ronin.” Red said before the light blue and green sets of armor glow their colors as the armguards of the white armor started to glow.

“Do you think you can handle such power?” light blue asked ace

“Not think. I know I can handle it.” Ace said before the two flashed into his arms and the white and red armguards appeared on his arms.

While this was going on, his partner was waiting for him to come of the ball of paper. She felt something behind her and thinking it was Arthur, but she finds an armored black tiger with swords on its sides walking to her.

“What are you?” she asked

“A companion of the warriors that the card summoned by your companion. I came to give you my power and armor.” The tiger said through a growl.

The tiger glowed a rainbow before flashing into her body giving her white and black stripes in her body. The armor appeared and the swords are on her back as her ears are poking through the helmet.

“Thank you, tiger-san.” Renamon said before turning back to the ball of paper ready to help. (Ace wearing this armor and think the armor on white/black blaze on renamon but it is remodeled to fit her: http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-g3EfR7hKOrU/Ub...)

The armguards started to glow before being engulfed in flames and this got ace thinking about frank’s card. Channeling his will, the fire grew as the flames were engulfing him and the orange with dark blue sets of armor started to glow their colors. The flames started to lessen revealing ace in his new upper body armor. The two flashed into his legs before the white armor appeared on his lower body and only the red set of armor was left.

“Stay on the right path and you will find what you are looking for.” Red said before glowing and flashed into ace’s forehead. After the flash, ace was wearing the helmet with a face mask completing his new form, but it’s not a real form like his digivultions.

Arthur was waiting for ace to come out of the ball of paper and he was getting annoyed.

~If lewis didn’t want the kid alive, I would have crushed him by now.~ He thought

The ball of paper started to burn, but it exploded outward revealing ace in his armor and he pulled his own sword that was made of the hardest crystal diamond with some mixed metal and gems making it even stronger after 3 years.

“Sorry for the wait, but I’m a certified badass.” Ace said with a smirk before the area around them turned into a white void meaning ace still had his trump card active.

“Well this is a surprise.” He added sounding surprised.

“How did you do this?” Arthur asked shocked at the area as said area had enclosed them and only ace can get them out.

“Trade secret.” Ace said as his partner was behind him waiting to help out.

“The revenge on your race stops here, Arthur. Only I can get us out of here in one piece or you will be stuck here if you kill me.” Ace said pointing his sword at said renamon.

Putting the sword in the sheath for a moment, he grabbed the digivice and triggered another card to help with the new fire card that he is wearing.

“Digi-Modify: Blur Step Activate.” Ace said feeling that he was faster now and still wearing the armor the fire card gave him.

Putting the digivice back in his armor where it vanished again, he drawn out his sword again he gave Arthur a pure look of determination and burning spirit.

“I have to win this one for frank, but to prove that you are wrong and you are like her.” Ace said as he used a small part of his mind to lessen the power of arthur’s mental power without him knowing thanks to the trump card.
111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Fire Card Fusion and Ace Gets Serious

info.brief_description: A story based on Digimon tamers. This story is set in the Tamers universe.
info.description:
Keep the age rating to thirteen plus. A story based on Digimon tamers. This story is set in the Tamers universe sometime after the D-Reaper was defeated.

Story: After the D-Reaper had fallen a corporation was created known as the X.A.C or the Xeno Affinity corporation, this corporation was created near Shinjuku by an unknown man for the sole purpose of stopping anything digimon related from going wrong again like another D-Reaper outbreak, or that was what was displayed and sought to be believed by the common man. The X.A.C got it's name from wanting to change the world, as it's real nature the X.A.C truly only wants power and control, they will stop at nothing to get what they want.

Frank the dark red furred renamon in chapter 1 has been fighting the X.A.C for a long time, he has not been alone however, he has had friends.

The way the X.A.C works is that people pay them for protection from digimon, they hunt digimon and profit off of them in anyway they can.

In the X.A.C the rankings go -- Soldier --> Digimon Hunter --> General --> Elite --> Commander --> Director --> Secondary Dictator --> "Dictator's-personal -Spy-unit" --> Dictator

It is unknown if the "Dictator" even exists, nothing at all is known about him publicly. Even his personal Spy unit is unknown on the highest level, however the Secondary Dictator does exist, his name is "Lewis Blackgate", he has no contact with the Dictator and has never seen him before but he serves and leads the corporation.

The X.A.C is run by three 'directors', each director controls a part of Shinjuku, "Viola Lambert" being the most dangerous and infamous of the directors runs Northern Shinjuku, Not much is known about her except that she is the most ruthless and cruel person out of the directors, and she is the only known person to have met the Dictator.

The second director is known as "Shaun Ryan", he controls the West sector of Shinjuku and does the most financial work out of all three of the directors by hunting the most digimon, his unit specializes in hunting and executing digimon or selling them off for profit.

The third and final director is known as "Professor Gamma" since he is a professor nicknamed since some of his research into Digimon revolves around the principles of light radiation and gamma radiation, he is a great man but he may be working for the wrong corporation. He is known to be the kindest of the directors and least demanding, despite this, his research is invaluable to the X.A.C's cause.
